5093051Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IList<T>> GetOverlappingChunks<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> sequence, int chunkSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> chunk = new List<T>(chunkSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var elt in sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        chunk.Add(elt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (chunk.Count > chunkSize)Di2015NewLine            chunk.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (chunk.Count == chunkSize)Di2015NewLine            yield return chunk.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar result = players.OrderByDescending(p => p.Score)Di2015NewLine             .GetOverlappingChunks(3)Di2015NewLine             .Where(x => x[1].Id == 1);Di2015NewLine

5093238Di2015UniqueSeparatorDirective Parameter order Clean-up Passes parameters in registers?Di2015NewLine--------- --------------- -------- -------------------------------Di2015NewLineregister  Left-to-right   Routine  YesDi2015NewLinepascal    Left-to-right   Routine  NoDi2015NewLinecdecl     Right-to-left   Caller   NoDi2015NewLinestdcall   Right-to-left   Routine  NoDi2015NewLinesafecall  Right-to-left   Routine  NoDi2015NewLine
5093238Di2015UniqueSeparatorMember name   DescriptionDi2015NewLine-----------   ------------------------ Di2015NewLineCdecl         The caller cleans the stack. This enables calling functions with   varargs, which makes it appropriate to use for methods that accept a variable number of parameters, such as Printf.Di2015NewLineFastCall      This calling convention is not supported.Di2015NewLineStdCall       The callee cleans the stack. This is the default convention for calling unmanaged functions with platform invoke.Di2015NewLineThisCall      The first parameter is the this pointer and is stored in register ECX. Other parameters are pushed on the stack. This calling convention is used to call methods on classes exported from an unmanaged DLL.Di2015NewLineWinapi        Supported by the .NET Compact Framework. This member is not actually a calling convention, but instead uses the default platform calling convention. For example, on Windows the default is StdCall and on Windows CE .NET it is Cdecl.Di2015NewLine
5093320Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Foo<T>(Expression<Func<T>> prop)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var propertyGetExpression = prop.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Display the property you are accessing, here "Height"Di2015NewLine    propertyGetExpression.Member.Name.Dump();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // "s" is replaced by a field access on a compiler-generated class from the closureDi2015NewLine    var fieldOnClosureExpression = propertyGetExpression.Expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find the compiler-generated classDi2015NewLine    var closureClassExpression = fieldOnClosureExpression.Expression as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine    var closureClassInstance = closureClassExpression.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find the field value, in this case it's a reference to the "s" variableDi2015NewLine    var closureFieldInfo = fieldOnClosureExpression.Member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine    var closureFieldValue = closureFieldInfo.GetValue(closureClassInstance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    closureFieldValue.Dump();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We know that the Expression is a property access so we get the PropertyInfo instanceDi2015NewLine    // And even access the value (yes compiling the expression would have been simpler :D)Di2015NewLine    var propertyInfo = propertyGetExpression.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine    var propertyValue = propertyInfo.GetValue(closureFieldValue, null);Di2015NewLine    propertyValue.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string s = "Hello world";Di2015NewLine    Foo(() => s.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5093402Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ctrls = new List<Control>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Control c in pnlLinks.Controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ctrls.Add(c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine    //randomize and put back inDi2015NewLine    foreach (Control c in ctrls.OrderBy(c => rand.Next()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pnlLinks.Controls.Remove(c);Di2015NewLine        pnlLinks.Controls.Add(c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5093649Di2015UniqueSeparatorSetProperty
5093649Di2015UniqueSeparatorIList<MyObject> myObjList = new List<MyObject>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (reader.Read()){Di2015NewLine  int fieldCount = reader.FieldCount;Di2015NewLine  MyObject myObj = new MyObject();Di2015NewLine  for(int i=0;i<fieldCount;i++){Di2015NewLine    SetProperty(myObj, reader.GetName(i), reader.GetOrdinal(i));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  myObjList.Add(myObj);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool SetProperty(object obj, String propertyName, object val) {Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        //get a reference to the PropertyInfo, exit if no property with that Di2015NewLine        //nameDi2015NewLine        System.Reflection.PropertyInfo pi = obj.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (pi == null) then return false;Di2015NewLine        //convert the value to the expected typeDi2015NewLine        val = Convert.ChangeType(val, pi.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        //attempt the assignmentDi2015NewLine        pi.SetValue(obj, val, null);Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5093741Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Branch {Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Link { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Branch Parent { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public TreeBranches Children { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal Branch(string Name, string Link) {Di2015NewLine        this.Name = Name;Di2015NewLine        this.Link = Link;Di2015NewLine        this.Children = new TreeBranches(this);Di2015NewLine    } // Branch - Constructor - OverloadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal Branch(string Name, string Link, TreeBranches Children) {Di2015NewLine        this.Name = Name;Di2015NewLine        this.Link = Link;Di2015NewLine        this.Children = Children;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Children.ToList().ForEach(delegate(Branch branch) {Di2015NewLine            branch.Parent = this;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    } // Branch - Constructor - OverloadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns a boolean indicating if the given Branch has any child Branches.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public bool HasChildren {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.Children.Count > 0; }Di2015NewLine    } // HasChildren - Property - ReadOnlyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the path from the oldest ancestor to the current Branch.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public string Path {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            string Result = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Branch parent = this;Di2015NewLine            while (parent != null) {Di2015NewLine                Result = string.Format("{0}/{1}", parent.Name, Result);Di2015NewLine                parent = parent.Parent;Di2015NewLine            } // while stepping up the treeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(Result) ? "" : Result.Substring(0, Result.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        } // getDi2015NewLine    } // Path - Property - ReadOnlyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine} // Branch - ClassDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TreeBranches : IList<Branch> {Di2015NewLine    private List<Branch> branches = new List<Branch>();Di2015NewLine    private Branch owner;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeBranches() {Di2015NewLine        this.owner = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeBranches(Branch owner) {Di2015NewLine        this.owner = owner;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(Branch branch) {Di2015NewLine        branch.Parent = this.owner;Di2015NewLine        this.branches.Add(branch);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Standard IList Method ImplementationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator<Branch> IEnumerable<Branch>.GetEnumerator() { return this.branches.GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine    System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return this.branches.GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine    public int IndexOf(Branch item) { return this.branches.IndexOf(item); }Di2015NewLine    public void Insert(int index, Branch item) { this.branches.Insert(index, item); }Di2015NewLine    public void RemoveAt(int index) { this.branches.RemoveAt(index); }Di2015NewLine    public Branch this[int index] {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.branches[index]; }Di2015NewLine        set { this.branches[index] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear() { this.branches.Clear(); }Di2015NewLine    public bool Contains(Branch item) { return this.branches.Contains(item); }Di2015NewLine    public void CopyTo(Branch[] array, int arrayIndex) { this.branches.CopyTo(array, arrayIndex); }Di2015NewLine    public int Count { get { return this.branches.Count(); } }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsReadOnly { get { return this.IsReadOnly; } }Di2015NewLine    public bool Remove(Branch item) { return this.branches.Remove(item); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion Standard IList Method ImplementationDi2015NewLine} // TreeBranches - ClassDi2015NewLine

5097066Di2015UniqueSeparatorcustomerList = AsyncHelpers.RunSync<List<Customer>>(() => GetCustomers());
5097066Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class AsyncHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Execute's an async Task<T> method which has a void return value synchronouslyDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="task">Task<T> method to execute</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void RunSync(Func<Task> task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var oldContext = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLine        var synch = new ExclusiveSynchronizationContext();Di2015NewLine        SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(synch);Di2015NewLine        synch.Post(async _ =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                await task();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                synch.InnerException = e;Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                synch.EndMessageLoop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }, null);Di2015NewLine        synch.BeginMessageLoop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(oldContext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Execute's an async Task<T> method which has a T return type synchronouslyDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Return Type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="task">Task<T> method to execute</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T RunSync<T>(Func<Task<T>> task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var oldContext = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLine        var synch = new ExclusiveSynchronizationContext();Di2015NewLine        SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(synch);Di2015NewLine        T ret = default(T);Di2015NewLine        synch.Post(async _ =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ret = await task();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                synch.InnerException = e;Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                synch.EndMessageLoop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }, null);Di2015NewLine        synch.BeginMessageLoop();Di2015NewLine        SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(oldContext);Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ExclusiveSynchronizationContext : SynchronizationContextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private bool done;Di2015NewLine        public Exception InnerException { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        readonly AutoResetEvent workItemsWaiting = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        readonly Queue<Tuple<SendOrPostCallback, object>> items =Di2015NewLine            new Queue<Tuple<SendOrPostCallback, object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void Send(SendOrPostCallback d, object state)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException("We cannot send to our same thread");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void Post(SendOrPostCallback d, object state)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                items.Enqueue(Tuple.Create(d, state));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            workItemsWaiting.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void EndMessageLoop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Post(_ => done = true, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void BeginMessageLoop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!done)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Tuple<SendOrPostCallback, object> task = null;Di2015NewLine                lock (items)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (items.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        task = items.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (task != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    task.Item1(task.Item2);Di2015NewLine                    if (InnerException != null) // the method threw an exeptionDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new AggregateException("AsyncHelpers.Run method threw an exception.", InnerException);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    workItemsWaiting.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override SynchronizationContext CreateCopy()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5097096Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, List<int>>
5097096Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IndexElliminator<T> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private List<T> _items;Di2015NewLine  private Dictionary<string, List<int>> _index;Di2015NewLine  private Func<T, string> _getContent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static HashSet<string> GetPairs(string value) {Di2015NewLine    HashSet<string> pairs = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < value.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      pairs.Add(value.Substring(i - 1, 2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return pairs;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IndexElliminator(List<T> items, Func<T, string> getContent, int maxIndexSize) {Di2015NewLine    _items = items;Di2015NewLine    _getContent = getContent;Di2015NewLine    _index = new Dictionary<string, List<int>>();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0;index<_items.Count;index++) {Di2015NewLine      T item = _items[index];Di2015NewLine      foreach (string pair in GetPairs(_getContent(item))) {Di2015NewLine        List<int> list;Di2015NewLine        if (_index.TryGetValue(pair, out list)) {Di2015NewLine          if (list != null) {Di2015NewLine            if (list.Count == maxIndexSize) {Di2015NewLine              _index[pair] = null;Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine              list.Add(index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine          list = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine          list.Add(index);Di2015NewLine          _index.Add(pair, list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static List<int> JoinLists(List<int> list1, List<int> list2) {Di2015NewLine    List<int> result = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    int i1 = 0, i2 = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (i1 < list1.Count && i2 < list2.Count) {Di2015NewLine      switch (Math.Sign(list1[i1].CompareTo(list2[i2]))) {Di2015NewLine        case 0: result.Add(list1[i1]); i1++; i2++; break;Di2015NewLine        case -1: i1++; break;Di2015NewLine        case 1: i2++; break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public List<T> Find(string query) {Di2015NewLine    HashSet<string> pairs = GetPairs(query);Di2015NewLine    List<List<int>> indexes = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLine    bool found = false;Di2015NewLine    foreach (string pair in pairs) {Di2015NewLine      List<int> list;Di2015NewLine      if (_index.TryGetValue(pair, out list)) {Di2015NewLine        found = true;Di2015NewLine        if (list != null) {Di2015NewLine          indexes.Add(list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    List<T> result = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    if (found && indexes.Count == 0) {Di2015NewLine      indexes.Add(Enumerable.Range(0, _items.Count).ToList());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (indexes.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine      while (indexes.Count > 1) {Di2015NewLine        indexes[indexes.Count - 2] = JoinLists(indexes[indexes.Count - 2], indexes[indexes.Count - 1]);Di2015NewLine        indexes.RemoveAt(indexes.Count - 1);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      foreach (int index in indexes[0]) {Di2015NewLine        if (_getContent(_items[index]).Contains(query)) {Di2015NewLine          result.Add(_items[index]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5097939Di2015UniqueSeparator/**Di2015NewLine * equals method before: Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLineboolean equals(image a, image b) {Di2015NewLine  for x = 0..15 do /* all 16 pixels in X */Di2015NewLine    for y = 0..15 do /* all 16 pixels in Y */Di2015NewLine      if a.getPixel(x,y) != b.getPixel(x,y) return false;Di2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/**Di2015NewLine * equals method after: Di2015NewLine *.Di2015NewLineboolean equals(image a, image b) {Di2015NewLine  /* this check lets you skip the loop in most cases */Di2015NewLine  /* still have to verify that the image is equal pixel for pixel though */Di2015NewLine  if a.checksum != b.checksum return false;Di2015NewLine  for x = 0..15 do /* all 16 pixels in X */Di2015NewLine    for y = 0..15 do /* all 16 pixels in Y */Di2015NewLine      if a.getPixel(x,y) != b.getPixel(x,y) return false;Di2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        List<DateTime> datesToKeep = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (DateTime date = stopPaymentStartDate.Date; date <= stopPaymentEndDate.Date; date = date.AddDays(1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (date <= period.StartDate.Date || date >= period.EndDate.Date)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine                newPeriod = new MembershipPeriod();Di2015NewLine                newPeriod.MembershipType = period.MembershipType;Di2015NewLine                newPeriod.StartDate = datesToKeep[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (i == datesToKeep.Count - 1 || (datesToKeep[i + 1] - datesToKeep[i]).Days > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newPeriod.EndDate = datesToKeep[i];Di2015NewLine                results.Add(newPeriod);Di2015NewLine                newPeriod = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return results;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum MembershipType Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    Gym = 1, Di2015NewLine 5103003Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void SendEmailsUsingThreadPool(List<Recipient> recipients)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var coreCount = Environment.ProcessorCount;Di2015NewLine      var itemCount = recipients.Count;Di2015NewLine      var batchSize = itemCount / coreCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var pending = coreCount;Di2015NewLine      using (var mre = new ManualResetEvent(false))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        for (int batchCount = 0; batchCount < coreCount; batchCount++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          var lower = batchCount * batchSize;Di2015NewLine          var upper = (batchCount == coreCount - 1) ? itemCount : lower + batchSize;Di2015NewLine          ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(st =>Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = lower; i < upper; i++)Di2015NewLine              SendEmail(recipients[i]);Di2015NewLine            if (Interlocked.Decrement(ref pending) == 0)Di2015NewLine              mre.Set();Di2015NewLine          });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        mre.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine      }      Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SendEmail(Recipient recipient)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //Send your Emails hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class RecipientDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public string FirstName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string LastName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string EmailAddress { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

5110663Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TagMatchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Tag { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Capture Capture { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public readonly List<string> Substrings = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var rx = new Regex(@"(?<OPEN>\\[[A-Za-z]+?\\])|(?<CLOSE>\\[/[A-Za-z]+?\\])|(?<TEXT>[^\\[]+|\\[)");Di2015NewLine    var str = "Lorem [AA]ipsum [BB]dolor sit [/BB]amet, [ consectetur ][/AA]adipisici elit, sed eiusmod tempor incidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquid ex ea commodi consequat. Quis aute iure reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint obcaecat cupiditat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.";Di2015NewLine    var matches = rx.Matches(str);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var recurse = new Stack<TagMatch>();Di2015NewLine    recurse.Push(new TagMatch { Tag = String.Empty });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var text = match.Groups["TEXT"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TagMatch last;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (text.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            last = recurse.Peek();Di2015NewLine            last.Substrings.Add(text.Value);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var open = match.Groups["OPEN"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string tag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (open.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tag = open.Value.Substring(1, open.Value.Length - 2);Di2015NewLine            recurse.Push(new TagMatch { Tag = tag, Capture = open.Captures[0] });Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var close = match.Groups["CLOSE"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tag = close.Value.Substring(2, close.Value.Length - 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        last = recurse.Peek();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (last.Tag == tag)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            recurse.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var lastLast = recurse.Peek();Di2015NewLine            lastLast.Substrings.Add("**" + last.Tag + "**");Di2015NewLine            lastLast.Substrings.AddRange(last.Substrings);Di2015NewLine            lastLast.Substrings.Add("**/" + last.Tag + "**");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (recurse.Count != 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var str2 in recurse.Pop().Substrings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(str2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var str3 = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5110663Di2015UniqueSeparator// Some classesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass BaseTagMatch {Di2015NewLine    public Capture Capture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass BeginTag : BaseTagMatchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Index;Di2015NewLine    public Capture Options;Di2015NewLine    public EndTag  |" +Di2015NewLine    // Immediately closed tag [a/]Di2015NewLine    @"(?# line 05)   (?>\\[  (?<TAG>  [A-Z]+  )  \\x20*  =?  \\x20*  (?<TAG_OPTION>(  (?<=  =  \\x20*)  (  (?!  \\x20*  /\\]) +Di2015NewLine    // Unmatched open tag [a]Di2015NewLine    @"(?# line 11)   (?>(?<UNMATCHED_TAG>  \\[  [A-Z]+  \\x20* =?  \\x20* (  (?<=  =  \\x20*)  (  (?!  \\x20*  \\])  [^\\[\\]\\r\\n]  )*  )? +Di2015NewLine    @"(?# line 17) (?(OPEN)(?!))" +Di2015NewLine    @"(?# line 18) $";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar rx = new Regex(pattern, RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace | 5111478Di2015UniqueSeparatorint
5111478Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsValid(int[] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // bit field (set to zero => no values processed yet)Di2015NewLine    int flag = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (int value in values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // value == 0 => reserved for still not filled cells, not to be processedDi2015NewLine        if (value != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // prepares the bit mask left-shifting 1 of value positionsDi2015NewLine            int bit = 1 << value; Di2015NewLine            // checks if the bit is already set, and if so the Sudoku is invalidDi2015NewLine            if ((flag & bit) != 0)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            // otherwise sets the bit ("value seen")Di2015NewLine            flag |= bit;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // if we didn't exit before, there are no problems with the given valuesDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5111694Di2015UniqueSeparatornull
5111694Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> BreadthFirstTopDownTraversal(T root, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> children)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Queue<T> q=new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine    q.Add(root);Di2015NewLine    while(q.Count>0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      T current = q.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine      yield return current;Di2015NewLine      foreach(var child in children(current))Di2015NewLine        q.Enqueue(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5116539Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression.Unbox
5116539Di2015UniqueSeparator(int)(object)5 < 6
5116539Di2015UniqueSeparator// boxed intDi2015NewLinevar left = Expression.Constant(5, typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// intDi2015NewLinevar right = Expression.Constant(6, typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// More generally, you can use right.Type  instead of typeof(int)Di2015NewLine// if its static type is appropriate. Di2015NewLine// Otherwise, you may need to unbox it too.Di2015NewLinevar unboxedLeft = Expression.Unbox(left, typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar lessThanEx = Expression.LessThan(unboxedLeft, right);    Di2015NewLinevar expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<bool>>(lessThanEx, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// True : (int)(object)5 < 6Di2015NewLinebool b = expression.Compile()();Di2015NewLine
5116539Di2015UniqueSeparator// From earlierDi2015NewLinevar left =  ...Di2015NewLinevar right = ...Di2015NewLinevar lessThanEx = ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar body = Expression.Condition(Expression.TypeEqual(left, right.Type), Di2015NewLine                                lessThanEx, Di2015NewLine                                Expression.Constant(false));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<bool>>(body, null);Di2015NewLine

5119443Di2015UniqueSeparator// First create a list of unique elementsDi2015NewLineList<string> ids = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineforeach (var account in RequestContext.accounts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string id = account.uniqueid;Di2015NewLine    if (ids.Contains(id))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ids.Add(id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then convert it into a string.Di2015NewLine// You could use string.Join(",", ids.ToArray()) here instead.Di2015NewLineStringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineforeach (string id in ids)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    builder.Append(id);Di2015NewLine    builder.Append(",");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (builder.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    builder.Length--; // Chop off the trailing commaDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinereturn builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine

5121045Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Compare(string first, string second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // For simplicity, let's assume neither is null :)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int firstNumber, secondNumber;Di2015NewLine    bool firstIsNumber = int.TryParse(first, out firstNumber);Di2015NewLine    bool secondIsNumber = int.TryParse(second, out secondNumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (firstIsNumber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If they're both numbers, compare them; otherwise first comes firstDi2015NewLine        return secondIsNumber ? firstNumber.CompareTo(secondNumber) : -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // If second is a number, that should come first; otherwise compareDi2015NewLine    // as stringsDi2015NewLine    return secondIsNumber ? 1 : first.CompareTo(second);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5121045Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Compare(string first, string second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // For simplicity, let's assume neither is null :)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int firstNumber, secondNumber;Di2015NewLine    bool firstIsNumber = int.TryParse(first, out firstNumber);Di2015NewLine    bool secondIsNumber = int.TryParse(second, out secondNumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return firstIsNumber Di2015NewLine        ? secondIsNumber ? firstNumber.CompareTo(secondNumber) : -1;Di2015NewLine        : secondIsNumber ? 1 : first.CompareTo(second);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5121480Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SeparatorConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Visibility _visible;Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var element = (TextBlock) value;Di2015NewLine        element.Loaded += ElementLoaded;Di2015NewLine        return _visible;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null; //not neededDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static void ElementLoaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var element = sender as TextBlock;Di2015NewLine        var parentItemsControl = element.FindParent(x => x is ItemsControl) as ItemsControl;Di2015NewLine        var parentPanel = element.FindParent(x => x is Panel) as Panel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parentItemsControl == null || element == null || parentPanel== null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var itemText = parentPanel.FindName("MyTextBlock") as TextBlock;Di2015NewLine        var collection = parentItemsControl.ItemsSource as IEnumerable<string>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (itemText == null || collection == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var list = collection.ToList();Di2015NewLine        if (list.IndexOf(itemText.Text) == list.Count() - 1) // Can be incorrect because we can have two same itemsDi2015NewLine           element.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5129643Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns all permutations of the input <see cref="IEnumerable{T}"/>.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="source">The list of items to permute.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A collection containing all permutations of the input <see cref="IEnumerable<T>"/>.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permutations<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    // Ensure that the source IEnumerable is evaluated only onceDi2015NewLine    return permutations(source.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> permutations<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var c = source.Count();Di2015NewLine    if (c == 1)Di2015NewLine        yield return source;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < c; i++)Di2015NewLine            foreach (var p in permutations(source.Take(i).Concat(source.Skip(i + 1))))Di2015NewLine                yield return source.Skip(i).Take(1).Concat(p);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5129706Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns an enumeration of tuples containing all unique pairs of distinctDi2015NewLine/// elements from the source collection. For example, the input sequenceDi2015NewLine/// { 1, 2, 3 } yields the pairs [1,2], [1,3] and [2,3] only.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, T>> UniquePairs<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    return uniquePairsIterator(source);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, T>> uniquePairsIterator<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Make sure that 'source' is evaluated only onceDi2015NewLine    IList<T> arr = source as IList<T> ?? source.ToList();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < arr.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        for (int j = i + 1; j < arr.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            yield return new Tuple<T, T>(arr[i], arr[j]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5129706Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar results = set.UniquePairs()Di2015NewLine                 .Where(pair => pair.Item1 == pair.Item2)Di2015NewLine                 .Select(pair => pair.Item1);Di2015NewLine

5132239Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ValidatorEngineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string model = "abc";Di2015NewLine        ValidatorEngine.Validate(() => UpdateByModel(model));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void Validate(Expression<Action> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodCall = action.Body as MethodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (methodCall == null) throw new InvalidOperationException("Expected a method-call");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Method: " + methodCall.Method.DeclaringType.Name + "." + methodCall.Method.Name);Di2015NewLine        var parameters = methodCall.Method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          Console.WriteLine(parameters[i].Name + ": " + Evaluate(methodCall.Arguments[i]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static object Evaluate(Expression exp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (exp.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine                return ((ConstantExpression)exp).Value;Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                var me = (MemberExpression)exp;Di2015NewLine                switch (me.Member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                        return ((FieldInfo)me.Member).GetValue(Evaluate(me.Expression));Di2015NewLine                    case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                        return ((PropertyInfo)me.Member).GetValue(Evaluate(me.Expression), null);Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        throw new NotSupportedException(me.Member.MemberType.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException(exp.NodeType.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void UpdateByModel(object model) {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5132938Di2015UniqueSeparator    public int FindBytes(byte[] src, byte[] find)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = -1;Di2015NewLine        int matchIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        // handle the complete source arrayDi2015NewLine        for(int i=0; i<src.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(src[i] == find[matchIndex])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (matchIndex==(find.Length-1))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    index = i - matchIndex;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                matchIndex++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                matchIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return index;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte[] ReplaceBytes(byte[] src, byte[] search, byte[] repl)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] dst = null;Di2015NewLine        int index = FindBytes(src, search);Di2015NewLine        if (index>=0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dst = new byte[src.Length - search.Length + repl.Length];Di2015NewLine            // before found arrayDi2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(src,0,dst,0, index);Di2015NewLine            // repl copyDi2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(repl,0,dst,index,repl.Length);Di2015NewLine            // rest of src arrayDi2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(Di2015NewLine                src, Di2015NewLine                index+search.Length , Di2015NewLine                dst, Di2015NewLine                index+repl.Length, Di2015NewLine                src.Length-(index+search.Length));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dst;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5132938Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Replace(this byte[] src, byte[] search, byte[] repl)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine      ReplaceBytes(src, search, repl);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5141654Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Strip(string source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] array = new char[source.Length];Di2015NewLine    int arrayIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    bool inside = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < source.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char let = source[i];Di2015NewLine        if (let == '<')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            inside = true;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (let == '>')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            inside = false;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!inside)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            array[arrayIndex] = let;Di2015NewLine            arrayIndex++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string text =  new string(array, 0, arrayIndex);Di2015NewLine    return System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(text, @"\\s+", " ").Trim();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5145080Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Regex regex = new Regex(@"^\\(.*,.*\\)$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(regex.IsMatch("x(a,b)")); // False due to the xDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(regex.IsMatch("(a,b)x")); // False due to the xDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(regex.IsMatch("(ab)"));   // False due to the lack of ,Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(regex.IsMatch("(a,b"));   // False due to the lack of )Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(regex.IsMatch("(a,b)"));   // True!Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(regex.IsMatch("(aaa,bbb)"));   // True!Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(regex.IsMatch("(,)"));   // True!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5146228Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WSTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( args.Length < 1 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Usage: [method_name] ([arg0], ...)");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MyService s = new MyService();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String methodName = args[0];Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo mi = s.GetType().GetMethod(methodName);Di2015NewLine        if( mi == null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("No such method: " + methodName);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterInfo[] parameters = mi.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        if( parameters.Length != (args.Length - 1) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Invalid argument count");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Object[] methodArgs = new Object[parameters.Length];Di2015NewLine        for( int ix = 0; ix < parameters.Length; ix++ )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type parameterType = parameters[ix].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine            String arg = args[ix + 1];Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                methodArgs[ix] = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(parameterType).ConvertFrom(arg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Unable to convert from '" + arg + "' to " + parameterType);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // print resultsDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Object result = mi.Invoke(s, methodArgs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ObjectDumper code at http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1347375/c-object-dumperDi2015NewLine            // Alternatively, Console.WriteLine() could be used for simple value types.Di2015NewLine            ObjectDumper.Write(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // print any out parametersDi2015NewLine            for( int ix = 0; ix < parameters.Length; ix++ )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if( parameters[ix].IsOut )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ObjectDumper.Write(methodArgs[ix]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch( Exception e )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Error invoking method '" + methodName + "'");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Press enter to continue...");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5147176Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Product {Di2015NewLine    // no one can "make" ProductsDi2015NewLine    private Product(IDataRecord dr) {Di2015NewLine        // Make this product from the contents of the IDataRecordDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static private List<Product> GetList(string sp, Action<DbCommand> addParameters) {Di2015NewLine        List<Product> lp = new List<Product>();Di2015NewLine        // DAL.Retrieve yields an iEnumerable<IDataRecord> (optional addParameters callback)Di2015NewLine        // public static IEnumerable<IDataRecord> Retrieve(string StoredProcName, Action<DbCommand> addParameters)Di2015NewLine        foreach (var dr in DAL.Retrieve(sp, addParameters) ) {Di2015NewLine            lp.Add(new Product(dr));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return lp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public List<Product> AllProducts() {Di2015NewLine        return GetList("sp_AllProducts", null) ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public List<Product> AllProductsStartingWith(string str) {Di2015NewLine        return GetList("sp_AllProductsStartingWith", cm => cm.Parameters.Add("StartsWith", str)) ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public List<Product> AllProductsOnOrder(Order o) {Di2015NewLine        return GetList("sp_AllProductsOnOrder", cm => cm.Parameters.Add("OrderId", o.OrderId)) ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5147176Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<IDataRecord> SqlRetrieve(string ConnectionString, string StoredProcName,Di2015NewLine                                                       Action<SqlCommand> addParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var cn = new SqlConnection(ConnectionString))Di2015NewLine        using (var cmd = new SqlCommand(StoredProcName, cn))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cn.Open();Di2015NewLine            cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (addParameters != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                addParameters(cmd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var rdr = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (rdr.Read())Di2015NewLine                    yield return rdr;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5147439Di2015UniqueSeparatorCube
5147439Di2015UniqueSeparatorCube
5147439Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class RotationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Action<Cube> _RotateAction;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Action<Cube> _UnrotateAction;  // used for undo or backtrackingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Rotation( Action<Cube> rotateAction, Action<Cube> unrotateAction )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _RotateAction = rotateAction;Di2015NewLine        _UnrotateAction = unrotateAction;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Rotate( Cube cube )   { _RotateAction( cube ); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Unrotate( Cube cube ) { _Unrotate( cube ); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly RotateFrontFaceClockswise = Di2015NewLine        new Rotation( Cube.RotateFrontFaceClockwiseDi2015NewLine                      Cube.RotateFrontFaceCounterClockwise );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly RotateFrontFaceCounterClockwise = Di2015NewLine        new Rotation( Cube.RotateFrontFaceCounterClockwise,Di2015NewLine                      Cube.RotateFrontFaceClockwise );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly RotateLeftFaceClockwise = Di2015NewLine        new Rotation( Cube.RotateLeftFaceClockwise,Di2015NewLine                      Cube.RotateLeftFaceCounterClockwise );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly RotateLeftFaceCounterClockwise = Di2015NewLine        new Rotation( Cube.RotateLeftFaceCounterClockwise,Di2015NewLine                      Cube.RotateLeftFaceClockwise );Di2015NewLine    // etc..Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// now we can keep track of the state changes of a cube using:Di2015NewLineList<Rotation> cubeRotations = new List<Rotation>();Di2015NewLinecubeRotations.Add( Rotation.RotateFrontFaceCounterClockwise );Di2015NewLinecubeRotations.Add( Rotation.RotateBackFaceClockwise );Di2015NewLinecubeRotations.Add( Rotation.RotateLeftFaceCounterClockwise );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// to apply the rotations to a cube, you simple walk through the data structureDi2015NewLine// calling the Rotate( ) method on each:Di2015NewLineCube someCube = new Cube( ... )Di2015NewLineforeach( Rotation r in cubeRotations )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    r.Rotate( someCube );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// to undo these rotations you can walk the like in reverse:Di2015NewLineforeach( Rotation r in cubeRotations.Reverse() )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    r.Unrotate( someCube );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

(myExcel.Worksheet)excelApp.Workbooks[Book2].Sheets["Sheet1"];Di2015NewLine    source_sheet.UsedRange.Copy();Di2015NewLine    wsDiff.Paste();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Determine working areaDi2015NewLine    int row = 0;Di2015NewLine    int col = 0;Di2015NewLine    int maxR = 0;Di2015NewLine    int maxC = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lr1 = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lr2 = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lc1 = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lc2 = 0;Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine   if (maxR < lr2) maxR = lr2;Di2015NewLine    if (maxC < lc2) maxC = lc2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //===================================================Di2015NewLine    //Compare ((myExcel.Range)wsBase.Cells[row, col]).Value2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If they are not equivilanteDi2015NewLine            if (!equiv(objNew, objBase, tolerance))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                wereDifferences = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Mark differing cellsDi2015NewLine                ((myExcel.Range)wsNew.Cells[row, col]).Interior.Color = System.Drawing.ColorTranslator.ToOle(System.Drawing.Color.Red);Di2015NewLine                ((myExcel.Range)wsBase.Cells[row, col]).Interior.Color = System.Drawing.ColorTranslator.ToOle(System.Drawing.Color.Red);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((objNew == null))Di2015NewLine                {                            Di2015NewLine                    ((myExcel.Range)wsDiff.Cells[row, col]).Interior.Color = System.Drawing.ColorTranslator.ToOle(System.Drawing.Color.Red);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (objNew.GetType().ToString() == "System.String")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ((myExcel.Range)wsDiff.Cells[row, col]).Interior.Color = System.Drawing.ColorTranslator.ToOle(System.Drawing.Color.Red);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ((myExcel.Range)wsDiff.Cells[row, col]).Interior.Color = System.Drawing.ColorTranslator.ToOle(System.Drawing.Color.Yellow);Di2015NewLine                    ((myExcel.Range)wsDiff.Cells[row, col]).Value2 = ((myExcel.Range)wsNew.Cells[row, col]).Value2 - ((myExcel.Range)wsBase.Cells[row, col]).Value2;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else //They are equivalentDi2015NewLine            {                        Di2015NewLine                if ((objNew == null))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (objNew.GetType().ToString() == "System.String")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {                            Di2015NewLine                    ((myExcel.Range)wsDiff.Cells[row, col]).Value2 = ((myExcel.Range)wsNew.Cells[row, col]).Value2 - ((myExcel.Range)wsBase.Cells[row, col]).Value2;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy formattingDi2015NewLine    myExcel.Range range1 = wsBase.get_Range((myExcel.Range)wsBase.Cells[1, 1], (myExcel.Range)wsBase.Cells[maxR, maxC]);Di2015NewLine    myExcel.Range range2 = wsDiff.get_Range((myExcel.Range)wsDiff.Cells[1, 1], (myExcel.Range)wsDiff.Cells[maxR, maxC]);Di2015NewLine    range1.Copy();Di2015NewLine    range2.PasteSpecial(myExcel.XlPasteType.xlPasteColumnWidths);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //excelApp.Workbooks[Book3].Close(false, false, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    excelApp.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine    return wereDifferences;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// Determines whether two objects are equivalentDi2015NewLine/// Numbers are equivalent within the specified toleranceDi2015NewLine/// Strings are equivalent if they are identicalDi2015NewLine/// obj1 and obj2 are the two objects being comparedDi2015NewLine/// tolerance is the maximum difference between two numbers for them to be deemed equivalentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool equiv(object obj1, object obj2, double tolerance)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((obj1 == null) && (obj2 == null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if ((obj1 == null) || (obj2 == null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //if both are numericDi2015NewLine    if (IsNumeric(obj1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (IsNumeric(obj2))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Math.Abs(Convert.ToDouble(obj2) - Convert.ToDouble(obj1)) < tolerance)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;    //If they are within toleranceDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;   //If they are outside toleranceDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;       //If only one is numericDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Now assuming both are just random stringsDi2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((string)obj1 == (string)obj2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Test whether a given object represents a numberDi2015NewLineinternal static bool IsNumeric(object ObjectToTest)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ObjectToTest == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double OutValue;Di2015NewLine        return double.TryParse(ObjectToTest.ToString().Trim(),Di2015NewLine            System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Any,Di2015NewLine            System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture,Di2015NewLine            out OutValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine///Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IValueConverter MembersDi2015NewLine        public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int weight = (int)value;Di2015NewLine            return 32 * MaxWeight / weight;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregion IValueConverter MembersDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5160670Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TagCloudDemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Window1 : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Window1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DataContext = new VM();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class VMDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public VM()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Words = LoadWords();Di2015NewLine            Tags = Tag.CreateTags(Words);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<string> Words { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<Tag> Tags { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<string> LoadWords()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string loremIpsum =Di2015NewLine                "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.";Di2015NewLine            string[] tokens = loremIpsum.Split(new char[] {' '});Di2015NewLine            List<string> words = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 500; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                words.Add(tokens[random.Next(tokens.Count())]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return words;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TagDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Tag(string name, int weight)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Name = name;Di2015NewLine            Weight = weight;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Weight { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<Tag> CreateTags(IEnumerable<string> words)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, int> tags = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string word in words)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int count = 1;Di2015NewLine                if (tags.ContainsKey(word))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    count = tags[word] + 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                tags[word] = count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return tags.Select(kvp => new Tag(kvp.Key, kvp.Value));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5169007Di2015UniqueSeparator public List<Item> GetItemsByFilter(BaseFilter filter, Di2015NewLine                   QueryComplete query, SortByBuilder sort)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine   var resultItems = new List<Item>();Di2015NewLine   var cursor = Db.Data.FindAs<BsonItem>(query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   cursor.SetSortOrder(sort);Di2015NewLine   if (filter.IsNeedPaging)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     cursor.SetSkip(filter.Skip).SetLimit(filter.Take);Di2015NewLine     filter.TotalCount = cursor.Count();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   resultItems.AddRange(cursor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return resultItems;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public class BaseFilterDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine   private int _itemsPerPage = 10;Di2015NewLine   private int _skip = 0;Di2015NewLine   private int _currentPage = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public BaseFilter()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     IsNeedPaging = true;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public int SkipDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     getDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine       if (_skip == 0)Di2015NewLine         _skip = (CurrentPage - 1) * _itemsPerPage;Di2015NewLine       return _skip;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     setDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine       _skip = value;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public int TakeDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         return _itemsPerPage;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine     setDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        _itemsPerPage = value;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsNeedPaging { get; 5172936Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Bitmap rotateImage(Bitmap b, float angle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //create a new empty bitmap to hold rotated imageDi2015NewLine  Bitmap returnBitmap = new Bitmap(b.Width, b.Height);Di2015NewLine  //make a graphics object from the empty bitmapDi2015NewLine  Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(returnBitmap);Di2015NewLine  //move rotation point to center of imageDi2015NewLine  g.TranslateTransform((float)b.Width/2, (float)b.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine  //rotateDi2015NewLine  g.RotateTransform(angle);Di2015NewLine  //move image backDi2015NewLine  g.TranslateTransform(-(float)b.Width/2,-(float)b.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine  //draw passed in image onto graphics objectDi2015NewLine  g.DrawImage(b, new Point(0, 0)); Di2015NewLine  return returnBitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5175327Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> Where<T>(this IQueryable<T> query, string column, object value, WhereOperation operation)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(column))Di2015NewLine        return query;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ParameterExpression parameter = Expression.Parameter(query.ElementType, "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemberExpression memberAccess = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var property in column.Split('.'))Di2015NewLine        memberAccess = MemberExpression.PropertyDi2015NewLine           (memberAccess ?? (parameter as Expression), property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //change param value typeDi2015NewLine    //necessary to getting bool from stringDi2015NewLine    ConstantExpression filter = Expression.ConstantDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            Convert.ChangeType(value, memberAccess.Type)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //switch operationDi2015NewLine    Expression condition = null;Di2015NewLine    LambdaExpression lambda = null;Di2015NewLine    switch (operation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //equal ==Di2015NewLine        case WhereOperation.Equal:Di2015NewLine            condition = Expression.Equal(memberAccess, filter);Di2015NewLine            lambda = Expression.Lambda(condition, parameter);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        //not equal !=Di2015NewLine        case WhereOperation.NotEqual:Di2015NewLine            condition = Expression.NotEqual(memberAccess, filter);Di2015NewLine            lambda = Expression.Lambda(condition, parameter);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        //string.Contains()Di2015NewLine        case WhereOperation.Contains:Di2015NewLine            condition = Expression.Call(memberAccess,Di2015NewLine                typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains"),Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant(value));Di2015NewLine            lambda = Expression.Lambda(condition, parameter);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MethodCallExpression result = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine           typeof(Queryable), "Where",Di2015NewLine           new[] { query.ElementType },Di2015NewLine           query.Expression,Di2015NewLine           lambda);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return query.Provider.CreateQuery<T>(result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5175327Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum WhereOperation { Equal, NotEqual, Contains }Di2015NewLine

5175937Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DeltaSet<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ISet<T> FirstItems { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public ISet<T> SecondItems { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public ISet<Tuple<T, T>> IntersectedItems { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // T is the type of the objects, U is the key used to determine equalityDi2015NewLine    public static DeltaSet<T> GetDeltaSet<T, U>(IDictionary<U, T> first,Di2015NewLine                                                IDictionary<U, T> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var firstUniques = new HashSet<T>(Di2015NewLine            first.Where(x => !second.ContainsKey(x.Key)).Select(x => x.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var secondUniques = new HashSet<T>(Di2015NewLine            second.Where(x => !first.ContainsKey(x.Key)).Select(x => x.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var intersection = new HashSet<Tuple<T, T>>(Di2015NewLine            second.Where(x => first.ContainsKey(x.Key)).Select(x =>Di2015NewLine                Tuple.Create(first[x.Key], x.Value)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new DeltaSet<T> { FirstItems = firstUniques,Di2015NewLine                                 SecondItems = secondUniques,Di2015NewLine                                 IntersectedItems = intersection };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static DeltaSet<IDClass> GetDeltas(IEnumerable<IDClass> first,Di2015NewLine                                              IEnumerable<IDClass> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetDeltaSet(first.ToDictionary(x => x.ID),Di2015NewLine                           second.ToDictionary(x => x.ID));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5179774Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double StdDev(this IEnumerable<double> values)Di2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine  double ret = 0;Di2015NewLine  if (values.Count() > 0) Di2015NewLine  {      Di2015NewLine     //Compute the Average      Di2015NewLine     double avg = values.Average();Di2015NewLine     //Perform the Sum of (value-avg)_2_2      Di2015NewLine     double sum = values.Sum(d => Math.Pow(d - avg, 2));Di2015NewLine     //Put it all together      Di2015NewLine     ret = Math.Sqrt((sum) / (values.Count()-1));   Di2015NewLine  }   Di2015NewLine  return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5179774Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double StdDev<T>(this IEnumerable<T> values, Func<T, double?> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double ret = 0;Di2015NewLine    var count = values.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Compute the AverageDi2015NewLine        double? avg = values.Average(selector);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Perform the Sum of (value-avg)^2Di2015NewLine        double sum = values.Select(selector).Sum(d =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (d.HasValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Math.Pow(d.Value - avg.Value, 2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return 0.0;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Put it all togetherDi2015NewLine        ret = Math.Sqrt((sum) / (count - 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5179774Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar results = from res in dt.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                  group res by res.Field<string>(key)Di2015NewLine                      into grpDi2015NewLine                      orderby Convert.ToInt32(grp.Key)Di2015NewLine                      select newDi2015NewLine                      {Di2015NewLine                          date = grp.Key,Di2015NewLine                          sum = grp.Average(r => Convert.ToDouble(r.Field<string>(average))),Di2015NewLine                          stdDev =  gp.Select(s => Convert.ToDouble(s.Field<string>(average))).StdDev(),Di2015NewLine                          // alternative override - note no need to convertDi2015NewLine                          stdDev2 = gp.StdDev(s => s.Field<string>(average))Di2015NewLine                      };Di2015NewLine

5181847Di2015UniqueSeparator// use a custom type converter.Di2015NewLine// it can be set on an interface so we don't have to redefine it for all deriving classesDi2015NewLine[TypeConverter(typeof(BenchmarkTypeConverter))]Di2015NewLinepublic interface IBenchmarkDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    Type Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5181847Di2015UniqueSeparator// this defines a custom type converter to convert from an IBenchmark to a stringDi2015NewLine// used by the property grid to display item when non editedDi2015NewLinepublic class BenchmarkTypeConverter : TypeConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvertTo(ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // we only know how to convert from to a stringDi2015NewLine        return typeof(string) == destinationType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ConvertTo(ITypeDescriptorContext context, CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(string) == destinationType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // just use the benchmark nameDi2015NewLine            IBenchmark benchmark = value as IBenchmark;Di2015NewLine            if (benchmark != null)Di2015NewLine                return benchmark.Name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "(none)";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5181847Di2015UniqueSeparator// this defines a custom UI type editor to display a list of possible benchmarksDi2015NewLine// used by the property grid to display item in edit modeDi2015NewLinepublic class BenchmarkTypeEditor : UITypeEditorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IWindowsFormsEditorService _editorService;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(ITypeDescriptorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // drop down mode (we'll host a listbox in the drop down)Di2015NewLine        return UITypeEditorEditStyle.DropDown;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object EditValue(ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _editorService = (IWindowsFormsEditorService)provider.GetService(typeof(IWindowsFormsEditorService));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use a list boxDi2015NewLine        ListBox lb = new ListBox();Di2015NewLine        lb.SelectionMode = SelectionMode.One;Di2015NewLine        lb.SelectedValueChanged += OnListBoxSelectedValueChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // analytic.Benchmarks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we store benchmarks objects directly in the listboxDi2015NewLine            int index = lb.Items.Add(benchmark);Di2015NewLine            if (benchmark.Equals(value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lb.SelectedIndex = index;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // show this model stuffDi2015NewLine        _editorService.DropDownControl(lb);Di2015NewLine        if (lb.SelectedItem == null) // no selection, return the passed-in value as isDi2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return lb.SelectedItem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnListBoxSelectedValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs set; }Di2015NewLine        public int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string FirstName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string LastName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Record() // Initializes default valuesDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RecordExists = true;Di2015NewLine            ID = 0;Di2015NewLine            FirstName = "";Di2015NewLine            LastName = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [WebMethod]Di2015NewLine    public string GetRecord(int id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Initialize the resultDi2015NewLine        Record resultRecord = new Record();Di2015NewLine        resultRecord.RecordExists = true;Di2015NewLine        resultRecord.ID = id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Query database to get record...Di2015NewLine        switch (id)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 0:Di2015NewLine                resultRecord.FirstName = "John";Di2015NewLine                resultRecord.LastName = "Something";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 1:Di2015NewLine                resultRecord.FirstName = "Foo";Di2015NewLine                resultRecord.LastName = "Foo2";Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                resultRecord.RecordExists = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Serialize the result here, and return it to JavaScript.Di2015NewLine        // The JavaScriptSerializer serializes to JSON.Di2015NewLine        return new JavaScriptSerializer().Serialize(resultRecord);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
