5183360Di2015UniqueSeparatorpackage de.fencing_game.paul.examples;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineimport java.awt.event.ActionListener;Di2015NewLineimport java.awt.event.ActionEvent;Di2015NewLineimport java.lang.reflect.Method;Di2015NewLineimport java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineimport javax.swing.*;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/**Di2015NewLine * An adapter class for calling an (almost) arbitraryDi2015NewLine * method as an ActionListener.Di2015NewLine *<p>Di2015NewLine * In fact, you can use any public method which has either no parameterDi2015NewLine * or any parameter of type {@link ActionEvent} or some superclassDi2015NewLine * of it (then it gets passed the ActionEvent there).Di2015NewLine *</p>Di2015NewLine * <p>Di2015NewLine * Additionally, the adapter needs an object of a class containingDi2015NewLine * this method as the receiver.Di2015NewLine * </p>Di2015NewLine *<p>Di2015NewLine * Inspired by the question <a href="http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5182558/java-vs-c-addactionlistener-vs-event-subscription">Java vs C# - AddActionListener vs event subscription</a> on Stackoverflow.Di2015NewLine *</p>Di2015NewLine * @author Palo EbermannDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic class MethodAdapter implements ActionListener {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /** the receiver object.  */Di2015NewLine    private Object target;Di2015NewLine    /** the method to be invoked. */Di2015NewLine    private Method method;Di2015NewLine    /** true if the method accepts the ActionEvent argument,Di2015NewLine        false if it is a no-arg method. */Di2015NewLine    private boolean takesArgument;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * creates a new MethodAdapter.Di2015NewLine     * @param o the receiver object.Di2015NewLine     * @param mName the name of a method on the receiver.Di2015NewLine     *     If there are multiple same-named methods in the classDi2015NewLine     *     of the receiver, we take the first one of these: <ul>Di2015NewLine     *  <li> a public method taking an ActionEvent as parameter</li>Di2015NewLine     *  <li> a public method taking an AWTEvent as parameter</li>Di2015NewLine     *  <li> a public method taking an EventObject as parameter</li>Di2015NewLine     *  <li> a public method taking an Object as parameter</li>Di2015NewLine     *  <li> a public method taking no parameter.</li>Di2015NewLine     * </ul>Di2015NewLine     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if there is no such method.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public MethodAdapter(Object o, String mName) {Di2015NewLine        this(o, findMethod(o, mName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * creates a new MethodAdapter.Di2015NewLine     * @param o the receiver object.Di2015NewLine     * @param m the method to be invoked.Di2015NewLine     *   This method has to be declared in the class of the receiver objectDi2015NewLine     *   or some supertype, has to take no or one argument, and if one, thenDi2015NewLine     *   of some supertype of {@link ActionEvent}.Di2015NewLine     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the method does not fit theDi2015NewLine     *   receiver, if the method takes too much arguments or arguments ofDi2015NewLine     *   wrong types.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public MethodAdapter(Object o, Method m) {Di2015NewLine        Class<?>[] params = m.getParameterTypes();Di2015NewLine        if(!m.getDeclaringClass().isInstance(o)) {Di2015NewLine            throw new IllegalArgumentException("wrong target object");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(params.length > 1) {Di2015NewLine            throw new IllegalArgumentException("too many arguments");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(params.length == 1 &&Di2015NewLine           ! params[0].isAssignableFrom(ActionEvent.class)) {Di2015NewLine            throw new IllegalArgumentException("method not compatible: " + m);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.target = o;Di2015NewLine        this.method = m;Di2015NewLine        this.takesArgument = params.length > 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Method findMethod(Object o, String mName) {Di2015NewLine        Class<?> c = o.getClass();Di2015NewLine        Class<?> eventClass = ActionEvent.class;Di2015NewLine        while(eventClass != null) {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                return c.getMethod(mName, ActionEvent.class);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch(NoSuchMethodException ex) {}Di2015NewLine            eventClass = eventClass.getSuperclass();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            // try a no-argument methodDi2015NewLine            return c.getMethod(mName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(NoSuchMethodException ex) {Di2015NewLine            throw new IllegalArgumentException("No fitting method named '" +Di2015NewLine                                               mName +"' on this object " + o +Di2015NewLine                                               " of class " + c.getName());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * the implementation of the actionPerformed method.Di2015NewLine     * We delegate to our target object and method.Di2015NewLine     * Any return value ofDi2015NewLine     * the method is silently ignored.Di2015NewLine     * @throws RuntimeException if any exception is thrown by the invokedDi2015NewLine     *   method (or during the invoke process), it is wrapped in aDi2015NewLine     *   RuntimeException and rethrown. Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event) {Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            if(takesArgument) {Di2015NewLine                method.invoke(target, event);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                method.invoke(target);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception e) {Di2015NewLine            if(e instanceof InvocationTargetException) {Di2015NewLine                Throwable t = e.getCause();Di2015NewLine                if(t instanceof Error)Di2015NewLine                    throw (Error)t;Di2015NewLine                e = (Exception)t;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(e instanceof RuntimeException)Di2015NewLine                throw (RuntimeException) e;Di2015NewLine            throw new RuntimeException(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * main method for testing purposes.Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] params) {Di2015NewLine        JFrame f = new JFrame("Test");Di2015NewLine        JButton b = new JButton("close");Di2015NewLine        b.addActionListener(new MethodAdapter(f, "dispose"));Di2015NewLine        f.getContentPane().add(b);Di2015NewLine        f.setVisible(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5183360Di2015UniqueSeparatorbutton.addActionListener(new MethodAdapter(this, "myRealMethod"));Di2015NewLine

5184838Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EvaluatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs evaluation & replacement of independent sub-treesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="expression">The root of the expression tree.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fnCanBeEvaluated">A function that decides whether a given expression node can be part of the local function.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A new tree with sub-trees evaluated and replaced.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static Expression PartialEval(Expression expression, Func<Expression, bool> fnCanBeEvaluated)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new SubtreeEvaluator(new Nominator(fnCanBeEvaluated).Nominate(expression)).Eval(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs evaluation & replacement of independent sub-treesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="expression">The root of the expression tree.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A new tree with sub-trees evaluated and replaced.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static Expression PartialEval(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return PartialEval(expression, Evaluator.CanBeEvaluatedLocally);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool CanBeEvaluatedLocally(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return expression.NodeType != ExpressionType.Parameter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Evaluates & replaces sub-trees when first candidate is reached (top-down)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class SubtreeEvaluator : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashSet<Expression> candidates;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal SubtreeEvaluator(HashSet<Expression> candidates)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.candidates = candidates;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Expression Eval(Expression exp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.Visit(exp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression Visit(Expression exp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (exp == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (this.candidates.Contains(exp))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this.Evaluate(exp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return base.Visit(exp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Expression Evaluate(Expression e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return e;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            LambdaExpression lambda = Expression.Lambda(e);Di2015NewLine            Delegate fn = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Constant(fn.DynamicInvoke(null), e.Type);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs bottom-up analysis to determine which nodes can possiblyDi2015NewLine    /// be part of an evaluated sub-tree.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class Nominator : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Func<Expression, bool> fnCanBeEvaluated;Di2015NewLine        HashSet<Expression> candidates;Di2015NewLine        bool cannotBeEvaluated;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Nominator(Func<Expression, bool> fnCanBeEvaluated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.fnCanBeEvaluated = fnCanBeEvaluated;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal HashSet<Expression> Nominate(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.candidates = new HashSet<Expression>();Di2015NewLine            this.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine            return this.candidates;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression Visit(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (expression != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool saveCannotBeEvaluated = this.cannotBeEvaluated;Di2015NewLine                this.cannotBeEvaluated = false;Di2015NewLine                base.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine                if (!this.cannotBeEvaluated)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (this.fnCanBeEvaluated(expression))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        this.candidates.Add(expression);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        this.cannotBeEvaluated = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                this.cannotBeEvaluated |= saveCannotBeEvaluated;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return expression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5185144Di2015UniqueSeparatorf(xirr)
5185144Di2015UniqueSeparatorf'(xirr)
5185144Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass xirrDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public const double tol = 0.001;Di2015NewLine        public delegate double fx(double x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static fx composeFunctions(fx f1, fx f2) {Di2015NewLine            return (double x) => f1(x) + f2(x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static fx f_xirr(double p, double dt, double dt0) {Di2015NewLine            return (double x) => p*Math.Pow((1.0+x),((dt0-dt)/365.0));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static fx df_xirr(double p, double dt, double dt0) {Di2015NewLine            return (double x) => (1.0/365.0)*(dt0-dt)*p*Math.Pow((x+1.0),(((dt0-dt)/365.0)-1.0));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static fx total_f_xirr(double[] payments, double[] days) {Di2015NewLine            fx resf = (double x) => 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < payments.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                resf = composeFunctions(resf,f_xirr(payments[i],days[i],days[0]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return resf;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static fx total_df_xirr(double[] payments, double[] days) {Di2015NewLine            fx resf = (double x) => 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < payments.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                resf = composeFunctions(resf,df_xirr(payments[i],days[i],days[0]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return resf;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static double Newtons_method(double guess, fx f, fx df) {Di2015NewLine            double x0 = guess;Di2015NewLine            double x1 = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            double err = 1e+100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (err > tol) {Di2015NewLine                x1 = x0 - f(x0)/df(x0);Di2015NewLine                err = Math.Abs(x1-x0);Di2015NewLine                x0 = x1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return x0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main (string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double[] payments = {-6800,1000,2000,4000}; // paymentsDi2015NewLine            double[] days = {01,08,16,25}; // days of payment (as day of year)Di2015NewLine            double xirr = Newtons_method(0.1,Di2015NewLine                                         total_f_xirr(payments,days),Di2015NewLine                                         total_df_xirr(payments,days));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("XIRR value is {0}", xirr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5187127Di2015UniqueSeparator// get cultures for a specific resource infoDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<CultureInfo> EnumSatelliteLanguages(string baseName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (baseName == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("baseName");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ResourceManager manager = new ResourceManager(baseName, Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly());Di2015NewLine    ResourceSet set = manager.GetResourceSet(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, true, false);Di2015NewLine    if (set != null)Di2015NewLine        yield return CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (CultureInfo culture in EnumSatelliteLanguages())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        set = manager.GetResourceSet(culture, true, false);Di2015NewLine        if (set != null)Di2015NewLine            yield return culture;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// determine what assemblies are availableDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<CultureInfo> EnumSatelliteLanguages()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (string directory in Directory.GetDirectories(AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(directory); // resource dir don't have an extension...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // format is XX-YY, we discard directories that can't match.Di2015NewLine        // could/should be replaced by a regex but we still need to catch cultures errors...Di2015NewLine        if (name.Length > 5)Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CultureInfo culture = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            culture = CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo(name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // not a good directory...Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string resName = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location) + ".resources.dll";Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(Path.Combine(Path.Combine(AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory, name), resName)))Di2015NewLine            yield return culture;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5189577Di2015UniqueSeparatorIndexOfMaxBy
5189577Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int IndexOfMaxBy<TSource, TProjected>Di2015NewLine    (this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine     Func<TSource, TProjected> selector,Di2015NewLine     IComparer<TProjected> comparer = nullDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //null-checks hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var erator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!erator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Sequence is empty.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (comparer == null)Di2015NewLine            comparer = Comparer<TProjected>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int index = 0, maxIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        var maxProjection = selector(erator.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (erator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index++;Di2015NewLine            var projectedItem = selector(erator.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (comparer.Compare(projectedItem, maxProjection) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxIndex = index;Di2015NewLine                maxProjection = projectedItem;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return maxIndex;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5191681Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ContactListBox_SelectionChanged(object sender, SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ContactListBox.SelectedIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentSelectedListBoxItem = this.ContactListBox.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(ContactListBox.SelectedIndex) as ListBoxItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (currentSelectedListBoxItem == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Iterate whole listbox tree and search for this itemsDi2015NewLine        TextBox nameBox = helperClass.FindDescendant<TextBox>(currentSelectedListBoxItem);Di2015NewLine        TextBlock nameBlock = helperClass.FindDescendant<TextBlock>(currentSelectedListBoxItem);Di2015NewLine
5191681Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T FindDescendant<T>(DependencyObject obj) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check if this object is the specified typeDi2015NewLine        if (obj is T)Di2015NewLine            return obj as T;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check for childrenDi2015NewLine        int childrenCount = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(obj);Di2015NewLine        if (childrenCount < 1)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // First check all the childrenDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DependencyObject child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(obj, i);Di2015NewLine            if (child is T)Di2015NewLine                return child as T;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Then check the childrens childrenDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DependencyObject child = FindDescendant<T>(VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(obj, i));Di2015NewLine            if (child != null && child is T)Di2015NewLine                return child as T;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5191975Di2015UniqueSeparatorImports SystemDi2015NewLineImports System.ComponentModelDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' The following example demonstrates how to createDi2015NewLine' a resource class that implements the IDisposable interfaceDi2015NewLine' and the IDisposable.Dispose method.Di2015NewLinePublic Class DisposeExampleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   ' A class that implements IDisposable.Di2015NewLine   ' By implementing IDisposable, you are announcing that Di2015NewLine   ' instances of this type allocate scarce resources.Di2015NewLine   Public Class MyResourceDi2015NewLine      Implements IDisposableDi2015NewLine      ' Pointer to an external unmanaged resource.Di2015NewLine      Private handle As IntPtrDi2015NewLine      ' Other managed resource this class uses.Di2015NewLine      Private component As componentDi2015NewLine      ' Track whether Dispose has been called.Di2015NewLine      Private disposed As Boolean = FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      ' The class constructor.Di2015NewLine      Public Sub New(ByVal handle As IntPtr)Di2015NewLine         Me.handle = handleDi2015NewLine      End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      ' Implement IDisposable.Di2015NewLine      ' Do not make this method virtual.Di2015NewLine      ' A derived class should not be able to override this method.Di2015NewLine      Public Overloads Sub Dispose() Implements IDisposable.DisposeDi2015NewLine         Dispose(True)Di2015NewLine         ' This object will be cleaned up by the Dispose method.Di2015NewLine         ' Therefore, you should call GC.SupressFinalize toDi2015NewLine         ' take this object off the finalization queue Di2015NewLine         ' and prevent finalization code for this objectDi2015NewLine         ' from executing a second time.Di2015NewLine         GC.SuppressFinalize(Me)Di2015NewLine      End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      ' Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios.Di2015NewLine      ' If disposing equals true, the method has been called directlyDi2015NewLine      ' or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resourcesDi2015NewLine      ' can be disposed.Di2015NewLine      ' If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the Di2015NewLine      ' runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference Di2015NewLine      ' other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.Di2015NewLine      Protected Overridable Overloads Sub Dispose(ByVal disposing As Boolean)Di2015NewLine         ' Check to see if Dispose has already been called.Di2015NewLine         If Not Me.disposed ThenDi2015NewLine            ' If disposing equals true, dispose all managed Di2015NewLine            ' and unmanaged resources.Di2015NewLine            If disposing ThenDi2015NewLine               ' Dispose managed resources.Di2015NewLine               component.Dispose()Di2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ' Call the appropriate methods to clean up Di2015NewLine            ' unmanaged resources here.Di2015NewLine            ' If disposing is false, Di2015NewLine            ' only the following code is executed.Di2015NewLine            CloseHandle(handle)Di2015NewLine            handle = IntPtr.ZeroDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ' Note disposing has been done.Di2015NewLine            disposed = TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         End IfDi2015NewLine      End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      ' Use interop to call the method necessary  Di2015NewLine      ' to clean up the unmanaged resource.Di2015NewLine      <System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport("Kernel32")> _Di2015NewLine      Private Shared Function CloseHandle(ByVal handle As IntPtr) As [Boolean]Di2015NewLine      End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      ' This finalizer will run only if the Dispose method Di2015NewLine      ' does not get called.Di2015NewLine      ' It gives your base class the opportunity to finalize.Di2015NewLine      ' Do not provide finalize methods in types derived from this class.Di2015NewLine      Protected Overrides Sub Finalize()Di2015NewLine         ' Do not re-create Dispose clean-up code here.Di2015NewLine         ' Calling Dispose(false) is optimal in terms ofDi2015NewLine         ' readability and maintainability.Di2015NewLine         Dispose(False)Di2015NewLine         MyBase.Finalize()Di2015NewLine      End SubDi2015NewLine   End ClassDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Public Shared Sub Main()Di2015NewLine      ' Insert code here to createDi2015NewLine      ' and use the MyResource object.Di2015NewLine   End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine

5194137Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CS_TestAppDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        struct OccurrenceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public int Line { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public int Column { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public Occurrence(int line, int column) : this()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Line = line;Di2015NewLine                Column = column;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string[] ReadFileSafe(string fileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If the file doesn't existDi2015NewLine            if (!File.Exists(fileName))Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Variable that stores all lines from the fileDi2015NewLine            string[] res;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Try reading the entire fileDi2015NewLine            try { res = File.ReadAllLines(fileName, Encoding.UTF8); }Di2015NewLine            catch (IOException) { return null; }Di2015NewLine            catch (ArgumentException) { return null; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return res;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<Occurrence> SearchFile(string[] file, string searchString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create a list to store all occurrences of substring in the fileDi2015NewLine            List<Occurrence> occ = new List<Occurrence>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < file.Length; i++) // Loop through all linesDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string line = file[i]; // Save the lineDi2015NewLine                int totalIndex = 0; // The total indexDi2015NewLine                int index = 0; // The relative index (the index found AFTER totalIndex)Di2015NewLine                while (true) // Loop until breaksDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    index = line.IndexOf(searchString); // Search for the indexDi2015NewLine                    if (index >= 0) // If a string was foundDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Save the occurrence to our listDi2015NewLine                        occ.Add(new Occurrence(i, totalIndex + index));Di2015NewLine                        totalIndex += index + searchString.Length; // Add the total index and the searchStringDi2015NewLine                        line = line.Substring(index + searchString.Length); // Cut of the searched partDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else break; // If no more occurances foundDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Here we have our list filled up now we can return itDi2015NewLine            return occ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void PrintFile(string[] file, List<Occurrence> occurences, string searchString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerator<Occurrence> enumerator = occurences.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine            enumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < file.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string line = file[i];Di2015NewLine                int cutOff = 0;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (enumerator.Current.Line == i)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write(line.Substring(0, enumerator.Current.Column - cutOff));Di2015NewLine                        Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.Red;Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write(searchString);Di2015NewLine                        Console.ResetColor();Di2015NewLine                        line = line.Substring(enumerator.Current.Column + searchString.Length - cutOff);Di2015NewLine                        cutOff = enumerator.Current.Column + searchString.Length;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (enumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(line); // Write the restDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool WriteToFile(string file, List<Occurrence> occ)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StreamWriter sw;Di2015NewLine            try { sw = new StreamWriter(file); }Di2015NewLine            catch (IOException) { return false; }Di2015NewLine            catch (ArgumentException) { return false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (Occurrence o in occ)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Write all occurencesDi2015NewLine                    sw.WriteLine("(" + (o.Line + 1).ToString() + "; " + (o.Column + 1).ToString() + ")");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sw.Close();Di2015NewLine                sw.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool anotherFile = true;Di2015NewLine            while (anotherFile)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("Please write the filename of the file you want to search: ");Di2015NewLine                string file = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("Please enter the string to search for: ");Di2015NewLine                string searchString = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string[] res = ReadFileSafe(file); // Call our search methodDi2015NewLine                if (res == null) // If it either couldn't open the file, or the file didn't existDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Couldn't open the read file.");Di2015NewLine                else // If the file was openedDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("File:");Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    List<Occurrence> occ = SearchFile(res, searchString); // Search the fileDi2015NewLine                    PrintFile(res, occ, searchString); // Print the resultDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.Write("Please enter the file you want to write the output to: ");Di2015NewLine                    file = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                    if (!WriteToFile(file, occ))Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Couldn't write output.");Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Output written to: " + file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Pause("continue");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            requestAgain:Di2015NewLine                Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("Do you want to search another file (Y/N): ");Di2015NewLine                ConsoleKeyInfo input = Console.ReadKey(false);Di2015NewLine                char c = input.KeyChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if(c != 'y' && c != 'Y' && c != 'n' && c != 'N')Di2015NewLine                    goto requestAgain;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                anotherFile = (c == 'y' || c == 'Y');Di2015NewLine                if(anotherFile)Di2015NewLine                    Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Pause(string action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Press any key to " + action + "...");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5194187Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic delegate void SomethingHappenedEventHandler(object sender, object args);Di2015NewLinepublic event SomethingHappenedEventHandler SomethingHappened;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void DoSomethingElse(object a, object b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Yay! " + a + " " + b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// If the signature exactly matches the delegate, just use the method nameDi2015NewLineSomethingHappened += DoSomethingElse;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void DoSomethingDifferent(object a)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Yay! " + a);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Otherwise, just use a lambda expressionDi2015NewLineSomethingHappened += (a, b) => DoSomethingDifferent(a);Di2015NewLine

5194187Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CreateDynamicHandler()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dynamicMethod = new DynamicMethod("DynamicMethod", null,Di2015NewLine        new[] { typeof(MyClass), typeof(object), typeof(object) }, typeof(MyClass));Di2015NewLine    var ilgen = dynamicMethod.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine    ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine    ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine    ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MethodInfo doSomethingElse = typeof(MyClass).GetMethod("DoSomethingElse",Di2015NewLine        new[] { typeof(object), typeof(object) });Di2015NewLine    ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Call, doSomethingElse);Di2015NewLine    ilgen.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Delegate emitted = dynamicMethod.CreateDelegate(Di2015NewLine        typeof(Action<MyClass, string, string>));Di2015NewLine    emitted.DynamicInvoke(this, "Hello", "World");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5195393Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<Company> GetRandomCompanies(int maxSelections)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IList<int> companyIds = _session.CreateCriteria<Company>() // get all available company idsDi2015NewLine            .SetProjection(LambdaProjection.Property<Company>(c => c.Id)).List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _session.CreateCriteria<Company>()Di2015NewLine            .Add(Restrictions.In(LambdaProjection.Property<Company>(c => c.Id), GetRandomCompanyIds(companyIds.ToList(), maxSelections))) // get 3 random IdsDi2015NewLine            .List<Company>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception xpt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ErrorSignal.FromCurrentContext().Raise(xpt);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new List<Company>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate List<int> GetRandomCompanyIds(List<int> companyIds, int maxSelections)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> randomIds = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= maxSelections; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this will get you the same result all day, new next dayDi2015NewLine        // it might not be what you need, so you could just use a new seed.Di2015NewLine        Random rng = new Random(DateTime.Now.DayOfYear);Di2015NewLine        randomIds.Add(companyIds[rng.Next(companyIds.Count)]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return randomIds;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5195523Di2015UniqueSeparatorRNGCryptoServiceProvider random = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLinebyte[] buffer = new byte[4];Di2015NewLinerandom.GetBytes(buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Creates a random number of tasks (not less than 2 -- up to 9)Di2015NewLineint iteration = new Random(BitConverter.ToInt32(buffer, 0)).Next(2, 9);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Creating " + iteration + " Parallel Tasks . . .");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDictionary<int, string> items = new Dictionary<int, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 1; i < iteration + 1; i++) // cosmetic +1 to avoid "Task N 0"Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    items.Add(i, "Parallel Task N " + i);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<Task> tasks = new List<Task>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I guess we should use a Parallel.Foreach() hereDi2015NewLineforeach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Creates a random interval to pause the thread at (up to 9 secs)Di2015NewLine    random.GetBytes(buffer);Di2015NewLine    int interval = new Random(BitConverter.ToInt32(buffer, 0)).Next(1000, 9000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5195486/Di2015NewLine    var temp = item;Di2015NewLine    var task = Task.Factory.StartNew(state =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(String.Format(temp.Value + " will be completed in {0} miliseconds . . .", interval));Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(interval);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }, temp.Value).ContinueWith(t => Console.WriteLine(t.AsyncState + " returned: " + t.Result));Di2015NewLine    tasks.Add(task);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTask.WaitAll(tasks.ToArray());Di2015NewLine

5200264Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineHttpWebRequest req = WebRequest.Create("http://apiurl.com?args=go.here");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereq.UserAgent = "The name of my program";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWebResponse resp = req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring responseData = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing(TextReader reader = new StreamReader(resp.GetResponseStream())) {Di2015NewLine    responseData = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//do whatever with responseDataDi2015NewLine
5200280Di2015UniqueSeparator    private Bitmap RotateImage(Bitmap b, float Angle) {Di2015NewLine        // The original bitmap needs to be drawn onto a new bitmap which will probably be bigger Di2015NewLine        // because the corners of the original will move outside the original rectangle.Di2015NewLine        // An easy way (OK slightly 'brute force') is to calculate the new bounding box is to calculate the positions of the Di2015NewLine        // corners after rotation and get the difference between the maximum and minimum x and y coordinates.Di2015NewLine        float wOver2 = b.Width / 2.0f;Di2015NewLine        float hOver2 = b.Height / 2.0f;Di2015NewLine        float radians = -(float)(Angle / 180.0 * Math.PI);Di2015NewLine        // Get the coordinates of the corners, taking the origin to be the centre of the bitmap.Di2015NewLine        PointF[] corners = new PointF[]{Di2015NewLine            new PointF(-wOver2, -hOver2),Di2015NewLine            new PointF(+wOver2, -hOver2),Di2015NewLine            new PointF(+wOver2, +hOver2),Di2015NewLine            new PointF(-wOver2, +hOver2)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {Di2015NewLine            PointF p = corners[i];Di2015NewLine            PointF newP = new PointF((float)(p.X * Math.Cos(radians) - p.Y * Math.Sin(radians)), (float)(p.X * Math.Sin(radians) + p.Y * Math.Cos(radians)));Di2015NewLine            corners[i] = newP;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find the min and max x and y coordinates.Di2015NewLine        float minX = corners[0].X;Di2015NewLine        float maxX = minX;Di2015NewLine        float minY = corners[0].Y;Di2015NewLine        float maxY = minY;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < 4; i++) {Di2015NewLine            PointF p = corners[i];Di2015NewLine            minX = Math.Min(minX, p.X);Di2015NewLine            maxX = Math.Max(maxX, p.X);Di2015NewLine            minY = Math.Min(minY, p.Y);Di2015NewLine            maxY = Math.Max(maxY, p.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the size of the new bitmap.Di2015NewLine        SizeF newSize = new SizeF(maxX - minX, maxY - minY);Di2015NewLine        // ...and create it.Di2015NewLine        Bitmap returnBitmap = new Bitmap((int)Math.Ceiling(newSize.Width), (int)Math.Ceiling(newSize.Height));Di2015NewLine        // Now draw the old bitmap on it.Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(returnBitmap)) {Di2015NewLine            g.TranslateTransform(newSize.Width / 2.0f, newSize.Height / 2.0f);Di2015NewLine            g.RotateTransform(Angle);Di2015NewLine            g.TranslateTransform(-b.Width / 2.0f, -b.Height / 2.0f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(b, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnBitmap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5200375Di2015UniqueSeparatorApplication.Run()

5200375Di2015UniqueSeparatordelegate void VoidDelegate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<int> results;Di2015NewLinebool cancelWork = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid DoWork() {Di2015NewLine    int calc;Di2015NewLine    results = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = int.MinValue ; i < int.MaxValue; i+=10) {Di2015NewLine        if(cancelWork) break;Di2015NewLine        results.Add(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.Invoke(new VoidDelegate(WorkFinished));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    button1.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    button2.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine    cancelWork = false;Di2015NewLine    Thread t = new Thread(DoWork);Di2015NewLine    t.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Button2_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    button2.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    cancelWork = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid WorkFinished() {Di2015NewLine    button1.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine    button2.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    textBox1.Text = results.Count.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5201549Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass PaddedFileSearchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int LineLength { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public FileInfo File { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PaddedFileSearch(FileInfo fileInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var length = FindLineLength(fileInfo);Di2015NewLine        //if (length == 0) throw new PaddedProgramException();Di2015NewLine        LineLength = length;Di2015NewLine        File = fileInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int FindLineLength(FileInfo fileInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(fileInfo.FullName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string line;Di2015NewLine            if ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var length = line.Length + 2;Di2015NewLine                return length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SeekMethod(List<int> lineNumbers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Debug.Print("");Di2015NewLine        Debug.Print("Line No\\t\\tPosition\\t\\tLine");Di2015NewLine        Debug.Print("-------\\t\\t--------\\t\\t-----------------");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lineNumbers.Sort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var fs = new FileStream(File.FullName, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lineNumbers.ForEach(ln => OutputData(fs, ln));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OutputData(FileStream fs, int lineNumber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var offset = (lineNumber - 5206361Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[]
5206361Di2015UniqueSeparatorint BYTES_TO_READ = 1000;Di2015NewLinevar buffer = new byte[BYTES_TO_READ];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (HttpWebResponse resp = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (Stream sm = resp.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int totalBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // You have to do this in a loop because there's no guarantee thatDi2015NewLine            // all the bytes you need will be ready when you call.Di2015NewLine            bytesRead = sm.Read(buffer, totalBytesRead, BYTES_TO_READ-totalBytesRead);Di2015NewLine            totalBytesRead += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        } while (totalBytesRead < BYTES_TO_READ);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Sometimes WebResponse will hang if you try to close beforeDi2015NewLine        // you've read the entire stream.  So you can abort the request.Di2015NewLine        request.Abort();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5209582Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection.Emit;Di2015NewLinepublic class MyClass1  {Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var foo = CreateMethod("Foo");Di2015NewLine        string s = foo(123, 456);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static Func<int,int,string> CreateMethod(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var method = new DynamicMethod("DynamicallyDefonedMethod_" + s,Di2015NewLine            typeof(string),Di2015NewLine            new Type[] { typeof(int), typeof(int) });Di2015NewLine        var il = method.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldstr, s);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine        il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Call, typeof(MyClass1).GetMethod("StaticallyDefinedMethod"), null);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLine        return (Func<int,int,string>)method.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<int, int, string>));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static string StaticallyDefinedMethod(string s, int a, int b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s + "; " + a + "/" + b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

     {Di2015NewLine            string uName = GetUserName(sessionId, server);Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(uName))Di2015NewLine                userSession.Add(uName,     Console.Write("Enter ServerName<Enter 0 to default to local>:");Di2015NewLine        input = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        IntPtr server = WTSOpenServer(input.Trim()[0] == '0' ? CDC or Device Context Object )Di2015NewLine        // passed via the DrawItemEventArgs parameterDi2015NewLine        Graphics g = e.Graphics ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the bounding rectangle of the item currently being paintedDi2015NewLine        Rectangle r = e.Bounds ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( e.Index >= 0 ) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rectangle rd = r; Di2015NewLine            r.X = r.Right ; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the brush object, at the specifid index in the colorArrayDi2015NewLine            SolidBrush b = (SolidBrush)colorArray[e.Index];Di2015NewLine            // Fill a portion of the rectangle with the selected brushDi2015NewLine            g.FillRectangle(b, rd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the rectangleDi2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(new Pen(new SolidBrush(Color.Black), 2 ), r );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( e.State == ( DrawItemState.NoAccelerator | DrawItemState.NoFocusRect))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // if the item is not selected draw it with a different colorDi2015NewLine                e.Graphics.FillRectangle(new SolidBrush(Color.White) , r);Di2015NewLine                e.DrawFocusRectangle();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // if the item is selected draw it with a different colorDi2015NewLine                e.Graphics.FillRectangle(new SolidBrush(Color.LightBlue) , r);Di2015NewLine                e.DrawFocusRectangle();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5210407Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string dec2frac(double dbl)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char neg = ' ';Di2015NewLine        double dblDecimal = dbl;Di2015NewLine        if (dblDecimal == (int) dblDecimal) return dblDecimal.ToString(); //return no if it's not a decimalDi2015NewLine        if (dblDecimal < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dblDecimal = Math.Abs(dblDecimal);Di2015NewLine            neg = '-';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var whole = (int) Math.Truncate(dblDecimal);Di2015NewLine        string decpart = dblDecimal.ToString().Replace(Math.Truncate(dblDecimal) + ".", "");Di2015NewLine        double rN = Convert.ToDouble(decpart);Di2015NewLine        double rD = Math.Pow(10, decpart.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string rd = recur(decpart);Di2015NewLine        int rel = Convert.ToInt32(rd);Di2015NewLine        if (rel != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rN = rel;Di2015NewLine            rD = (int) Math.Pow(10, rd.Length) - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //just a few prime factors for testing purposesDi2015NewLine        var primes = new[] {41, 43, 37, 31, 29, 23, 19, 17, 13, 11, 7, 5, 3, 2};Di2015NewLine        foreach (int i in primes) reduceNo(i, ref rD, ref rN);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rN = rN + (whole*rD);Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0}{1}/{2}", neg, rN, rD);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5211790Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int ToCharArray2(uint value, char[] buffer, int bufferIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int maxLength = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer[bufferIndex] = '0';Di2015NewLine        return 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int startIndex = bufferIndex + maxLength - 1;Di2015NewLine    int index = startIndex;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer[index] = (char)('0' + value % 10);Di2015NewLine        value /= 10;Di2015NewLine        --index;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (value != 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int length = startIndex - index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bufferIndex != index + 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (index != startIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++index;Di2015NewLine            buffer[bufferIndex] = buffer[index];Di2015NewLine            ++bufferIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5215549Di2015UniqueSeparator CREATE FUNCTION dbo.DelimitedSplit8KNEWDi2015NewLine--===== Created by Jeff Moden (Prototype: Testing Still in Progress)Di2015NewLine--===== Define I/O parametersDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine        @pString    VARCHAR(8000),Di2015NewLine        @pDelimiter CHAR(1)Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLineRETURNS TABLEDi2015NewLine   WITH SCHEMABINDINGDi2015NewLine     ASDi2015NewLine RETURNDi2015NewLineWITH Di2015NewLine      E1(N) AS (Di2015NewLine                SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL Di2015NewLine                SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL Di2015NewLine                SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1Di2015NewLine               ),                          --10Di2015NewLine      E2(N) AS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 a, E1 b), --100Di2015NewLine      E4(N) AS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 a, E2 b), --10,000Di2015NewLinecteTally(N) AS (Di2015NewLine                SELECT 0 UNION ALLDi2015NewLine                SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY N) FROM E4Di2015NewLine               )Di2015NewLine SELECT ItemNumber = ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY t.N),Di2015NewLine        ItemValue  = SUBSTRING(@pString,t.N+1,ISNULL(NULLIF(CHARINDEX(@pDelimiter,@pString,t.N+1),0),DATALENGTH(@pString)+1)-t.N-1)Di2015NewLine   FROM cteTally tDi2015NewLine  WHERE t.N BETWEEN 0 AND DATALENGTH(@pString)Di2015NewLine    AND (SUBSTRING(@pString,t.N,1) = @pDelimiter OR t.N = 0)Di2015NewLine;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine

sa |] -> (ra, sa)Di2015NewLine            | _ -> ("net.tcp://localhost:4508/", "net.tcp://remotehost:4508/")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        let netTcp() = new NetTcpBinding(SecurityMode.None)Di2015NewLine        let mexTcp() = MetadataExchangeBindings.CreateMexTcpBinding()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        let tcpRouter = createSimpleRouter netTcp  routerAddress           serviceAddressDi2015NewLine        let mexRouter = createSimpleRouter mexTcp (routerAddress + "mex") (serviceAddress + "mex")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tcpRouter.Open()Di2015NewLine        mexRouter.Open()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("routing ...\\n{0} <-> R:{1}", serviceAddress, routerAddress)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ignore <| Console.ReadKey trueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        0Di2015NewLine

5222042Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Func<T, object, object> MagicMethod<T>(MethodInfo method)    Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    var parameter = method.GetParameters().Single();    Di2015NewLine    var instance = Expression.Parameter(typeof (T), "instance");Di2015NewLine    var argument = Expression.Parameter(typeof (object), "argument");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var methodCall = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine        instance,Di2015NewLine        method,Di2015NewLine        Expression.Convert(argument, parameter.ParameterType)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, object, object>>(Di2015NewLine        Expression.Convert(methodCall, typeof (object)),Di2015NewLine        instance, argumentDi2015NewLine        ).Compile();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

5222390Di2015UniqueSeparator /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get Intersection pointDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="a1">a1 is line1 start</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="a2">a2 is line1 end</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="b1">b1 is line2 start</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="b2">b2 is line2 end</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static Vector? Intersects(Vector a1, Vector a2, Vector b1, Vector b2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector b = a2 - a1;Di2015NewLine        Vector d = b2 - b1;Di2015NewLine        var bDotDPerp = b.X * d.Y - b.Y * d.X;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if b dot d == 0, it means the lines are parallel so have infinite intersection pointsDi2015NewLine        if (bDotDPerp == 0)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector c = b1 - a1;Di2015NewLine        var t = (c.X * d.Y - c.Y * d.X) / bDotDPerp;Di2015NewLine        if (t < 0 || t > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var u = (c.X * b.Y - c.Y * b.X) / bDotDPerp;Di2015NewLine        if (u < 0 || u > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return a1 + t * b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5229280Di2015UniqueSeparator// This method will change the square button to a circular button by Di2015NewLine// creating a new circle-shaped GraphicsPath object and setting it Di2015NewLine// to the RoundButton objects region.Di2015NewLineprivate void roundButton_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath buttonPath = Di2015NewLine                            new System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set a new rectangle to the same size as the button's Di2015NewLine    // ClientRectangle property.Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Rectangle newRectangle = roundButton.ClientRectangle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Decrease the size of the rectangle.Di2015NewLine    newRectangle.Inflate(-10, -10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Draw the button's border.Di2015NewLine    e.Graphics.DrawEllipse(System.Drawing.Pens.Black, newRectangle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Increase the size of the rectangle to include the border.Di2015NewLine    newRectangle.Inflate( 1,  1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a circle within the new rectangle.Di2015NewLine    buttonPath.AddEllipse(newRectangle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the button's Region property to the newly created Di2015NewLine    // circle region.Di2015NewLine    roundButton.Region = new System.Drawing.Region(buttonPath);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5229854Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void MySqlLink(string strConnection, string strCommand, Dictionary<string, object> parameters, DataTable dtTable)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dtTable.Clear();Di2015NewLine    MySqlConnection MyConnection = new MySqlConnection(strConnection);Di2015NewLine    MySqlCommand MyCommand = new MySqlCommand(strCommand, MyConnection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> param in parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue(param.Key, param.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MySqlDataAdapter MyDataAdapter = new MySqlDataAdapter(MyCommand);Di2015NewLine    MyDataAdapter.Fill(dtTable);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5229863Di2015UniqueSeparator// Initial query just to get a sequence of { Symbol, Date, Value } entries.Di2015NewLinevar entries = from securityPair in ds.securitiesDi2015NewLine              from valuation in securityPair.Value.timeSeries["liquidity"]Di2015NewLine              select new { Symbol = securityPair.Key,Di2015NewLine                           Date = valuation.Key,Di2015NewLine                           valuation.Value };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now do the grouping, sorting and rankingDi2015NewLinevar groupedByDate = from entry in entriesDi2015NewLine                    group entry by entry.Date into dateDi2015NewLine                    select date.OrderByDescending(x => x.Value)Di2015NewLine                               .ThenBy(x => x.Symbol)Di2015NewLine                               // Use the overload of Select which includes theDi2015NewLine                               // index within the sequence (*after* sorting)Di2015NewLine                               .Select((x, index) => new {Di2015NewLine                                    x.Symbol,Di2015NewLine                                    x.Value,Di2015NewLine                                    x.Date,Di2015NewLine                                    Rank = index + 1,Di2015NewLine                                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now group by symbol againDi2015NewLinevar rankingsBySymbol = groupedByDate.SelectMany(day => day)Di2015NewLine                                    .ToLookup(tuple => tuple.Symbol,Di2015NewLine                                              tuple => new { tuple.Date,Di2015NewLine                                                             tuple.Value,Di2015NewLine                                                             tuple.Rank });Di2015NewLine

5236206Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate DataTable ReadExcelFile(string flatFilePath, bool firstRowHasHeaders)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SpreadsheetInfo.SetLicense("MY KEY");Di2015NewLine        ExcelFile excelFile = new ExcelFile();Di2015NewLine        excelFile.LoadXls(flatFilePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int unnamed = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int cols;Di2015NewLine        string[] columns;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int curRow = 0;Di2015NewLine        int curCol = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataTable dataTable = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        ExcelWorksheet worksheet = excelFile.Worksheets[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (cols = 0; cols < worksheet.Rows[0].AllocatedCells.Count; cols++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (firstRowHasHeaders)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (worksheet.Rows[0].Cells[cols].Value != null)Di2015NewLine                    dataTable.Columns.Add(worksheet.Rows[0].Cells[cols].Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dataTable.Columns.Add("Unnamed Column " + (++unnamed));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                curRow = 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dataTable.Columns.Add("Column " + (cols + 1));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (; curRow < worksheet.Rows.Count; curRow++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            columns = new string[cols];Di2015NewLine            for (curCol = 0; curCol < cols; curCol++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (worksheet.Rows[curRow].Cells[curCol].Value == null)Di2015NewLine                    columns[curCol] = "";Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    columns[curCol] = worksheet.Rows[curRow].Cells[curCol].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dataTable.Rows.Add(columns);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dataTable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine        string sidAsString = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // first call gets lenght of TokenInformationDi2015NewLine        Result = GetTokenInformation( token , TOKEN_INFORMATION_CLASS.TokenUser , IntPtr.Zero , TokenInfLength , out TokenInfLength ); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr TokenInformation = Marshal.AllocHGlobal( TokenInfLength ) ; Di2015NewLine        Result = GetTokenInformation( token  , TOKEN_INFORMATION_CLASS.TokenUser , TokenInformation , TokenInfLength , out TokenInfLength ) ; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( Result ) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TOKEN_USER TokenUser = ( TOKEN_USER )Marshal.PtrToStructure( TokenInformation , typeof( TOKEN_USER ) ) ; 5239717Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ReflectClass1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ReflectClass1(Random rand)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Prop1 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop2 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop3 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop4 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop5 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop6 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop7 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop8 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop9 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine        Prop10 = rand.Next();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Prop1 {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public int Prop2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop3 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop4 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop5 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop6 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop7 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop8 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop9 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Prop10 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random random = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);Di2015NewLine    private List<Func<ReflectClass1, int>> delegateList = new List<Func<ReflectClass1, int>>();Di2015NewLine    private static int Iterations = 1000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UseDelegateList()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //setup delegateListDi2015NewLine        foreach (var propertyInfo in typeof(ReflectClass1).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Func<ReflectClass1, int> getPropDelegate = (Func<ReflectClass1, int>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<ReflectClass1, int>), null, propertyInfo.GetGetMethod());Di2015NewLine            delegateList.Add(getPropDelegate);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ReflectClass1 testClass = new ReflectClass1(random);Di2015NewLine        int total = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < Iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var getProp in delegateList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                total += getProp(testClass);Di2015NewLine            }           Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(string.Format(" End delegate performance test. iterations = {0:N0} end time: {1:0.000}", Iterations, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds / 1000.0));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(total);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UseDirectReflection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int total = 0;Di2015NewLine        ReflectClass1 testClass = new ReflectClass1(random);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < Iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo propertyInfo in typeof(ReflectClass1).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (propertyInfo == null)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                total += (int)propertyInfo.GetValue(testClass, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(string.Format(" End direct reflection performance test. iterations = {0:N0} end time: {1:0.000}", Iterations, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds / 1000.0));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(total);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DirectOutputTest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int total = 0;Di2015NewLine        ReflectClass1 testClass = new ReflectClass1(random);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < Iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop1;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop2;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop3;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop4;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop5;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop6;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop7;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop8;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop9;Di2015NewLine            total += testClass.Prop10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(string.Format(" End direct output benchmark. iterations = {0:N0} end time: {1:0.000}", Iterations, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds / 1000.0));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(total);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var test = new Program();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        test.UseDelegateList();Di2015NewLine        test.UseDirectReflection();Di2015NewLine        test.DirectOutputTest();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5240349Di2015UniqueSeparatorint ixNew = 0;Di2015NewLineint ixOld = 0;Di2015NewLinewhile (ixNew < NewList.Count && ixOld < OldList.Count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Again with the comparison delegate.Di2015NewLine    // I'll assume that MyRecord implements IComparableDi2015NewLine    int cmpRslt = OldList[ixOld].CompareTo(NewList[ixNew]);Di2015NewLine    if (cmpRslt == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // records have the same customer id.Di2015NewLine        // compare for changes.Di2015NewLine        ++ixNew;Di2015NewLine        ++ixOld;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (cmpRslt < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this old record is not in the new file.  It's been deleted.Di2015NewLine        ++ixOld;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this new record is not in the old file.  It was added.Di2015NewLine        ++ixNew;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// At this point, one of the lists might still have items.Di2015NewLinewhile (ixNew < NewList.Count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // NewList[ixNew] is an added recordDi2015NewLine    ++ixNew;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (ixOld < OldList.Count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // OldList[ixOld] is a deleted recordDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

static char sep = ',';Di2015NewLine    private SqlString result;Di2015NewLine    public void Init()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Accumulate(SqlInt32 value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!value.IsNull && !Contains(value))Di2015NewLine            this.Add(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private Add(Convert.ToInt32(value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static string Wrap(SqlInt32 value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.Value.ToString() + sep;Di2015NewLine this.Add(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<SqlInt32> Items(SumKeys group)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var value in group.result.Value.Split(sep))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i;Di2015NewLine            if (Int32.TryParse(value, out i))Di2015NewLine                yield return i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public SqlString Terminate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.result.Value.TrimEnd(sep);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void 5242793Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Encrypt(string originalString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(originalString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullExceptionDi2015NewLine               ("The string which needs to be encrypted can not be null.");Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    DESCryptoServiceProvider cryptoProvider = new DESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, Di2015NewLine        cryptoProvider.CreateEncryptor(bytes, bytes), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine    StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(cryptoStream);Di2015NewLine    writer.Write(originalString);Di2015NewLine    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(memoryStream.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)memoryStream.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5243384Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap mg = new Bitmap(strUploadPath);Di2015NewLineSize newSize = new Size(Convert.ToInt32(DispMaxWidth), Convert.ToInt32(DispMaxHeight));Di2015NewLineBitmap bp = ResizeImage(mg, newSize);Di2015NewLineif (bp != null)Di2015NewLinebp.Save(strUploadPath, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Bitmap ResizeImage(Bitmap mg, Size newSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double ratio = 0d;Di2015NewLine            double myThumbWidth = 0d;Di2015NewLine            double myThumbHeight = 0d;Di2015NewLine            int x = 0;Di2015NewLine            int y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Bitmap bp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((mg.Width / Convert.ToDouble(newSize.Width)) > (mg.Height /Di2015NewLine            Convert.ToDouble(newSize.Height)))Di2015NewLine                ratio = Convert.ToDouble(mg.Width) / Convert.ToDouble(newSize.Width);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                ratio = Convert.ToDouble(mg.Height) / Convert.ToDouble(newSize.Height);Di2015NewLine            myThumbHeight = Math.Ceiling(mg.Height / ratio);Di2015NewLine            myThumbWidth = Math.Ceiling(mg.Width / ratio);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Size thumbSize = new Size((int)myThumbWidth, (int)myThumbHeight);Di2015NewLine            Size thumbSize = new Size((int)newSize.Width, (int)newSize.Height);Di2015NewLine            bp = new Bitmap(newSize.Width, newSize.Height);Di2015NewLine            x = (newSize.Width - thumbSize.Width) / 2;Di2015NewLine            y = (newSize.Height - thumbSize.Height);Di2015NewLine            // Had to add System.Drawing class in front of Graphics ---Di2015NewLine            System.Drawing.Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(bp);Di2015NewLine            g.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine            g.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(x, y, thumbSize.Width, thumbSize.Height);Di2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(mg, rect, 0, 0, mg.Width, mg.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return bp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5252487Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Bind<TSourceProperty, TDestinationProperty>(this INotifyPropertyChanged source, Expression<Func<TSourceProperty, TDestinationProperty>> bindExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var expressionDetails = GetExpressionDetails<TSourceProperty, TDestinationProperty>(bindExpression);Di2015NewLine        var sourcePropertyName = expressionDetails.Item1;Di2015NewLine        var destinationObject = expressionDetails.Item2;Di2015NewLine        var destinationPropertyName = expressionDetails.Item3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do binding hereDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} {1}", sourcePropertyName, destinationPropertyName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Tuple<string, INotifyPropertyChanged, string> GetExpressionDetails<TSourceProperty, TDestinationProperty>(Expression<Func<TSourceProperty, TDestinationProperty>> bindExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var lambda = (LambdaExpression)bindExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterExpression sourceExpression = lambda.Parameters.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression destinationExpression = (MemberExpression)lambda.Body;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var memberExpression = destinationExpression.Expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        var constantExpression = memberExpression.Expression as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        var fieldInfo = memberExpression.Member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine        var destinationObject = fieldInfo.GetValue(constantExpression.Value) as INotifyPropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Tuple<string, INotifyPropertyChanged, string>(sourceExpression.Name, destinationObject, destinationExpression.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5254439Di2015UniqueSeparator// First, get all appointments for the following userDi2015NewLinevar TheUserID = 1;Di2015NewLinevar appointments = from appointment in Appointments where appointment.UserID == TheUserID select appointment;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then, find all unique datesDi2015NewLinevar uniqueDates = appointments.Select(a => a.AppointSet)Di2015NewLine    .Union(appointments.Where(a => a.AppointAttended.HasValue).Select(a => a.AppointAttended.Value))Di2015NewLine    .Union(appointments.Where(a => a.AppointCancelled.HasValue).Select(a => a.AppointCancelled.Value))Di2015NewLine    .Union(appointments.Where(a => a.AppointRescheduled.HasValue).Select(a => a.AppointRescheduled.Value))Di2015NewLine    .Union(appointments.Select(a => a.AppointmentDatetime))Di2015NewLine      // Filter by the month/yearDi2015NewLine    .Where(x => x.Month == TheDate.Month && x.Year == TheDate.Year)Di2015NewLine      // Finally, select a new object for each unique date holding the countsDi2015NewLine    .Select(x => new {Di2015NewLine        Date = x,Di2015NewLine        Cancelled = appointments.Where(a => a.AppointCancelled.HasValue && a.AppointCancelled.Value == x).Count(),Di2015NewLine        Rescheduled = appointments.Where(a => a.AppointRescheduled.HasValue && a.AppointRescheduled.Value == x).Count(),Di2015NewLine        Set = appointments.Where(a => a.AppointSet == x).Count(),Di2015NewLine        Attended = appointments.Where(a => a.AppointAttended.HasValue && a.AppointAttended.Value == x).Count()Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine

5256673Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DataGridHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static DataGridCell GetCell(DataGrid dataGrid, int row, int column)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataGridRow rowContainer = GetRow(dataGrid, row);Di2015NewLine        if (rowContainer != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataGridCellsPresenter presenter = may possibly be virtualizedDi2015NewLine            DataGridCell cell = (DataGridCell)presenter.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(column);Di2015NewLine            if (cell == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // now try to bring into view and retreive the cellDi2015NewLine                dataGrid.ScrollIntoView(rowContainer, dataGrid.Columns[column]);Di2015NewLine                cell = (DataGridCell)presenter.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(column);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return dataGrid.Items[index];Di2015NewLine            // may be virtualized, bring into view and try againDi2015NewLine            dataGrid.ScrollIntoView(hh);Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine    public static T GetVisualChild<T>(Visual parent) where T : VisualDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T child = default(T);Di2015NewLine        int numVisuals = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numVisuals; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Visual v = (Visual)VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i);Di2015NewLine            child = v as T;Di2015NewLine            if (child == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                child = GetVisualChild<T>(v);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (child != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return child;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
