5257449Di2015UniqueSeparator// create and initialize a crypto algorithmDi2015NewLineprivate static SymmetricAlgorithm getAlgorithm(string password) {Di2015NewLine    SymmetricAlgorithm algorithm = Rijndael.Create();Di2015NewLine    Rfc2898DeriveBytes rdb = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(Di2015NewLine        password, new byte[] {Di2015NewLine        0x53,0x6f,0x64,0x69,0x75,0x6d,0x20,             // salty goodnessDi2015NewLine        0x43,0x68,0x6c,0x6f,0x72,0x69,0x64,0x65Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine    algorithm.Padding = PaddingMode.ISO10126;Di2015NewLine    algorithm.Key = rdb.GetBytes(32);Di2015NewLine    algorithm.IV = rdb.GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLine    return algorithm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Di2015NewLine * encryptStringDi2015NewLine * provides simple encryption of a string, with a given passwordDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic static string EncryptString(string clearText, string password) {Di2015NewLine    SymmetricAlgorithm algorithm = getAlgorithm(password);Di2015NewLine    byte[] clearBytes = System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(clearText);Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, algorithm.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine    cs.Write(clearBytes, 0, clearBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    cs.Close();Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine * decryptStringDi2015NewLine * provides simple decryption of a string, with a given passwordDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLinepublic static string DecryptString(string cipherText, string password) {Di2015NewLine    SymmetricAlgorithm algorithm = getAlgorithm(password);Di2015NewLine    byte[] cipherBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherText);Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, algorithm.CreateDecryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine    cs.Write(cipherBytes, 0, cipherBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    cs.Close();            Di2015NewLine    return System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetString(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5257517Di2015UniqueSeparator    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void CompositeDictionary()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create a dictionary of periodsDi2015NewLine        IList<PeriodHolder> periodHolders = new List<PeriodHolder>();Di2015NewLine        periodHolders.Add(new PeriodHolder("Type1", "06:00", "14:00"));Di2015NewLine        periodHolders.Add(new PeriodHolder("Type2", "14:01", "22:00"));Di2015NewLine        periodHolders.Add(new PeriodHolder("Type3", "22:01", "05:59"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create the test combobox in a test formDi2015NewLine        Form testForm = new Form();Di2015NewLine        ComboBox testComoBox = new ComboBox();Di2015NewLine        testForm.Controls.Add(testComoBox);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        testComoBox.DataSource = periodHolders;Di2015NewLine        testComoBox.ValueMember = "PeriodName"; //The name of the Name property in PeriodHolderDi2015NewLine        testComoBox.DisplayMember = "PeriodString"; //The name of the PeriodString property in PeriodHolderDi2015NewLine        testComoBox.SelectedIndex = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string selectedType = testComoBox.ValueMember[testComoBox.SelectedIndex].ToString(); //Get the type so you can lookup in dictionaryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PeriodHolder periodHolder in periodHolders)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (periodHolder.PeriodName == selectedType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Use period holder for whatever you needDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string fromTime = periodHolder.TimeFrom; //Extract fromTime from periodholderDi2015NewLine                string toTime = periodHolder.TimeTo;     //Extract toTime from periodholderDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(periodHolder.PeriodString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                break; //you've found it -- Don't look anymoreDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class PeriodHolderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public PeriodHolder(string name, string from, string to)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PeriodName= name;Di2015NewLine            TimeFrom =from;Di2015NewLine            TimeTo = to;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public string PeriodName { get; 5260993Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate DataTable DataTableJoiner(DataTable dt1, DataTable dt2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var commonColumns = dt1.Columns.OfType<DataColumn>().Intersect(dt2.Columns.OfType<DataColumn>(), new DataColumnComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        result.Columns.AddRange(Di2015NewLine            dt1.Columns.OfType<DataColumn>()Di2015NewLine            .Union(dt2.Columns.OfType<DataColumn>(), new DataColumnComparer())Di2015NewLine            .Select(c => new DataColumn(c.Caption, c.DataType, c.Expression, c.ColumnMapping))Di2015NewLine            .ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rowData = dt1.AsEnumerable().Join(Di2015NewLine            dt2.AsEnumerable(),Di2015NewLine            row => commonColumns.Select(col => row[col.Caption]).ToArray(),Di2015NewLine            row => commonColumns.Select(col => row[col.Caption]).ToArray(),Di2015NewLine            (row1, row2) => Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var row = result.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                row.ItemArray = result.Columns.OfType<DataColumn>().Select(col => row1.Table.Columns.Contains(col.Caption) ? row1[col.Caption] : row2[col.Caption]).ToArray();Di2015NewLine                return row;Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            new ObjectArrayComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var row in rowData)Di2015NewLine            result.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5260993Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate class DataColumnComparer : IEqualityComparer<DataColumn>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IEqualityComparer<DataColumn> MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Equals(DataColumn x, DataColumn y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return x.Caption == y.Caption;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int GetHashCode(DataColumn obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return obj.Caption.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ObjectArrayComparer : IEqualityComparer<object[]>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region IEqualityComparer<object[]> MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Equals(object[] x, object[] y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!object.Equals(x[i], y[i]))Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int GetHashCode(object[] obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return obj.Sum(item => item.GetHashCode());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5263665Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TestDynamicFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // static storageDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, Func<ICalculate>> InstanceCreateCache = new Dictionary<string, Func<ICalculate>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // how to invoke itDi2015NewLine    static int Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // invoke it, this is lightning fast and the first-time cache will be arrangedDi2015NewLine        // also, no need to give the full method anymore, just the classname, as weDi2015NewLine        // use an interface for the rest. Almost full type safety!Di2015NewLine        ICalculate instanceOfCalculator = this.CreateCachableICalculate("RandomNumber");Di2015NewLine        int result = instanceOfCalculator.ExecuteCalculation();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // searches for the class, initiates it (calls factory method) and returns the instanceDi2015NewLine    // TODO: add a lot of error handling!Di2015NewLine    ICalculate CreateCachableICalculate(string className)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(!InstanceCreateCache.ContainsKey(className))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the type (several ways exist, this is an eays one)Di2015NewLine            Type type = TypeDelegator.GetType("TestDynamicFactory." + className);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // NOTE: this can be tempting, but do NOT use the following, because you cannot Di2015NewLine            // create a delegate from a ctor and will loose many performance benefitsDi2015NewLine            //ConstructorInfo constructorInfo = type.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // works with public instance/static methodsDi2015NewLine            MethodInfo mi = type.GetMethod("Create");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // the "magic", turn it into a delegateDi2015NewLine            var createInstanceDelegate = (Func<ICalculate>) Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof (Func<ICalculate>), mi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // store for future referenceDi2015NewLine            InstanceCreateCache.Add(className, createInstanceDelegate);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return InstanceCreateCache[className].Invoke();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// example of your ICalculate interfaceDi2015NewLinepublic interface ICalculateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Initialize();Di2015NewLine    int ExecuteCalculation();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// example of an ICalculate classDi2015NewLinepublic class RandomNumber : ICalculateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random  _random;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static RandomNumber Create()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var random = new RandomNumber();Di2015NewLine        random.Initialize();Di2015NewLine        return random;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Initialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _random = new Random(DateTime.Now.Millisecond);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ExecuteCalculation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _random.Next();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5263779Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine    var test = new { Test1 = 42, Test2 = "123", Test3 = 3.14195 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    somethingSomething(test, t => t.Test1);Di2015NewLine    somethingSomething(test, t => t.Test2);Di2015NewLine    somethingSomething(test, t => t.Test3);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void somethingSomething<TObj,TProperty>(TObj obj, Expression<Func<TObj,TProperty>> expr) {Di2015NewLine    var accessor = GetMemberAccessor(expr, obj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String name = accessor.Name;Di2015NewLine    TProperty value = accessor.Value;Di2015NewLine    String typeName = accessor.Type.Name;Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0} = {1} ({2})", name, value, typeName);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5263779Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static MemberAccessor<TReturn> GetMemberAccessor<TObj,TReturn>(Expression<Func<TObj, TReturn>> expr, TObj tar) {Di2015NewLine    var body = expr.Body;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemberExpression memberExpression = null;Di2015NewLine    if (body is UnaryExpression) {Di2015NewLine        var ue = (UnaryExpression)body;Di2015NewLine        memberExpression = (MemberExpression)ue.Operand;Di2015NewLine    } else if (body is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine        memberExpression = (MemberExpression)body;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException("can't get MemberExpression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String name = memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new MemberAccessor<TReturn>(tar, name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MemberAccessor<T> {Di2015NewLine    private readonly PropertyDescriptor propertyDesc;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Object target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MemberAccessor(Object target, String propertyName) {Di2015NewLine        this.target = target;Di2015NewLine        this.propertyDesc = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(target)[propertyName];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public String Name {Di2015NewLine        get { return propertyDesc.Name; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Type Type {Di2015NewLine        get { return propertyDesc.PropertyType; }Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine    public T Value {Di2015NewLine        get { return (T)Convert.ChangeType(propertyDesc.GetValue(target), typeof(T)); }Di2015NewLine        set { propertyDesc.SetValue(target, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5269160Di2015UniqueSeparator    static IList<double> FindPeaks(IList<double> values, int rangeOfPeaks)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<double> peaks = new List<double>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int checksOnEachSide = rangeOfPeaks / 2;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < values.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double current = values[i];Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<double> range = values;Di2015NewLine            if( i > checksOnEachSide )Di2015NewLine                range = range.Skip(i - checksOnEachSide);Di2015NewLine            range = range.Take(rangeOfPeaks);Di2015NewLine            if (current == range.Max())Di2015NewLine                peaks.Add(current);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return peaks;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5269282Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CreateRandomPassword()  //If you are always going to want 8 characters then there is no need to pass a length argumentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string _allowedChars = "abcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-";Di2015NewLine        Random randNum = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);  //Don't forget to seed your random, or else it won't really be randomDi2015NewLine        char[] chars = new char[8];Di2015NewLine        //again, no need to pass this a variable if you always want 8Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            chars[i] = _allowedChars[randNum.Next(_allowedChars.Length)];Di2015NewLine            //No need to over complicate this, passing an integer value to Random.Next will "Return a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum."Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new string(chars);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void Button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        userid.Text = "Your id is:     " + id.Text;Di2015NewLine        if(id .Text!="")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            password.Text = "Your password is: " + CreateRandomPassword(); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5274520Di2015UniqueSeparator// Imagine, you know that there is a Foo with Key 1 already in the DB, or youDi2015NewLine// could also query for that Foo to attach to the contextDi2015NewLineFoo foo = new Foo() { Key = 1 }; Di2015NewLinecontext.Foos.Attach(foo);Di2015NewLine// Now, we have an object of type Foo with Key 1 in the object contextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Let's assume, that the table FooTemp in the DB is empty. We create theDi2015NewLine// first FooTempDi2015NewLineFooTemp fooTemp = new FooTemp();Di2015NewLinecontext.Foos.Add(fooTemp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecontext.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine// If the FooTemp table has an autogenerated identity with seed 1 in the DB,Di2015NewLine// our FooTemp gets Key 1 in the DB. Because Entity Framework accepts theDi2015NewLine// DB changes after calling SaveChanges, our FooTemp object will now haveDi2015NewLine// the Key 1, so we have a second Foo (since FooTemp derives from Foo) withDi2015NewLine// the same Key 1 in the same object contextDi2015NewLine

5275324Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static decimal GetMedian(this IEnumerable<int> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a copy of the input, and sort the copyDi2015NewLine    int[] temp = source.ToArray();    Di2015NewLine    Array.Sort(temp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = temp.Length;Di2015NewLine    if (count == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("Empty collection");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (count % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // count is even, average two middle elementsDi2015NewLine        int a = temp[count / 2 - 1];Di2015NewLine        int b = temp[count / 2];Di2015NewLine        return (a + b) / 2m;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // count is odd, return the middle elementDi2015NewLine        return temp[count / 2];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5275354Di2015UniqueSeparatorHashSet<string> ScannedRecords = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var row in dtCSV.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Build a string that contains the combined column valuesDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (string col in columns)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("[{0}={1}]", col, row[col].ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Try to add the string to the HashSet.Di2015NewLine    // If Add returns false, then there is a prior record with the same values Di2015NewLine    if (!ScannedRecords.Add(sb.ToString())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This record is a duplicate.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5276126Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main( string[] args )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // create the background worker objectDi2015NewLine   BackgroundWorker _worker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // tell the background worker it can be cancelled and report progressDi2015NewLine   _worker.WorkerReportsProgress = true;Di2015NewLine   _worker.WorkerSupportsCancellation = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // a worker thread object where the actual work happensDi2015NewLine   WorkerThread thread = new WorkerThread();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // add our event handlersDi2015NewLine   _worker.RunWorkerCompleted += new RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler( thread.RunWorkerCompleted );Di2015NewLine   _worker.ProgressChanged += new ProgressChangedEventHandler( thread.ProgressChanged );Di2015NewLine   _worker.DoWork += new DoWorkEventHandler( thread.DoWork );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // start the worker threadDi2015NewLine   _worker.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // wait for it to be completedDi2015NewLine   while( !_worker.CancellationPending )Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // sleep for a secondDi2015NewLine      Thread.Sleep( 1000 );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5276126Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WorkerThreadDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void DoWork( object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       //get a handle on the worker that started this requestDi2015NewLine       BackgroundWorker workerSender = sender as BackgroundWorker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // loop through 10 times and report the progress back to the sending objectDi2015NewLine       for( int i = 0; i < 10; i++ )Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          // tell the worker that we want to report progress being madeDi2015NewLine          workerSender.ReportProgress( i );Di2015NewLine          Thread.Sleep( 100 );Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // cancel the thread and send back that we cancelledDi2015NewLine       workerSender.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine       e.Cancel = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RunWorkerCompleted( object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       Console.WriteLine( "Worker Done!!" );          Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProgressChanged( object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // print out the percent changedDi2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine( e.ProgressPercentage );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5279433Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring pdfLinksUrl = "http://www.google.com/search?q=filetype%3Apdf";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Load HTML content    Di2015NewLinevar webGet = new HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlWeb();Di2015NewLinevar doc = webGet.Load(pdfLinksUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// select all <A> nodes from the document using XPathDi2015NewLine// (unfortunately we can't select attribute nodes directly asDi2015NewLine// it is not yet supported by HAP)Di2015NewLinevar linkNodes = doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("//a[@href]");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// select all href attribute values ending with '.pdf' (case-insensitive)Di2015NewLinevar pdfUrls = from linkNode in linkNodesDi2015NewLine    let href = linkNode.Attributes["href"].ValueDi2015NewLine    where href.ToLower().EndsWith(".pdf")Di2015NewLine    select href;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// write all PDF links to fileDi2015NewLineSystem.IO.File.WriteAllLines(@"c:\\pdflinks.txt", pdfUrls.ToArray());Di2015NewLine

5282806Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnumerable.SortBy

5282806Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnumerableSorter
5282806Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal abstract class EnumerableSorter<TElement>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // MethodsDi2015NewLine    protected EnumerableSorter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal abstract int CompareKeys(int index1, int index2);Di2015NewLine    internal abstract void ComputeKeys(TElement[] elements, int count);Di2015NewLine    private void QuickSort(int[] map, int left, int right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = left;Di2015NewLine            int num2 = right;Di2015NewLine            int num3 = map[index + ((num2 - index) >> 1)];Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while ((index < map.Length) && (this.CompareKeys(num3, map[index]) > 0))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    index++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while ((num2 >= 0) && (this.CompareKeys(num3, map[num2]) < 0))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    num2--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (index > num2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (index < num2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int num4 = map[index];Di2015NewLine                    map[index] = map[num2];Di2015NewLine                    map[num2] = num4;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                index++;Di2015NewLine                num2--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (index <= num2);Di2015NewLine            if ((num2 - left) <= (right - index))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (left < num2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.QuickSort(map, left, num2);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                left = index;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (index < right)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.QuickSort(map, index, right);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                right = num2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (left < right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal int[] Sort(TElement[] elements, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ComputeKeys(elements, count);Di2015NewLine        int[] map = new int[count];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            map[i] = i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.QuickSort(map, 0, count - 1);Di2015NewLine        return map;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class EnumerableSorter<TElement, TKey> : EnumerableSorter<TElement>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // FieldsDi2015NewLine    internal IComparer<TKey> comparer;Di2015NewLine    internal bool descending;Di2015NewLine    internal TKey[] keys;Di2015NewLine    internal Func<TElement, TKey> keySelector;Di2015NewLine    internal EnumerableSorter<TElement> next;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // MethodsDi2015NewLine    internal EnumerableSorter(Func<TElement, TKey> keySelector, IComparer<TKey> comparer, bool descending, EnumerableSorter<TElement> next)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.keySelector = keySelector;Di2015NewLine        this.comparer = comparer;Di2015NewLine        this.descending = descending;Di2015NewLine        this.next = next;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal override int CompareKeys(int index1, int index2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int num = this.comparer.Compare(this.keys[index1], this.keys[index2]);Di2015NewLine        if (num == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this.next == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (index1 - index2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return this.next.CompareKeys(index1, index2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!this.descending)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return num;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return -num;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal override void ComputeKeys(TElement[] elements, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.keys = new TKey[count];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.keys[i] = this.keySelector(elements[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (this.next != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.next.ComputeKeys(elements, count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5283412Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string GetRightPartOfPath(string path, string startAfterPart)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // use the correct seperator for the environmentDi2015NewLine    var pathParts = path.Split(Path.DirectorySeparatorChar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this assumes a case sensitive check. If you don't want this, you may want to loop through the pathParts lookingDi2015NewLine    // for your "startAfterPath" with a StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase check insteadDi2015NewLine    int startAfter = Array.IndexOf(pathParts, startAfterPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (startAfter == -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // path path not foundDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // try and work out if last part was a directory - if not, drop the last part as we don't want the filenameDi2015NewLine    var lastPartWasDirectory = pathParts[pathParts.Length - 1].EndsWith(Path.DirectorySeparatorChar.ToString());Di2015NewLine    return string.Join(Di2015NewLine        Path.DirectorySeparatorChar.ToString(), Di2015NewLine        pathParts, startAfter,Di2015NewLine        pathParts.Length - startAfter - (lastPartWasDirectory?0:1));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5288062Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SomeClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Use parameters rather than accessing module level propertiesDi2015NewLine    private IList<ColumnInformation> GetColumnInformationForTable(string dbName, string tableName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Favor object oriented styles and meaningful names.  Your method does not return a list of tablesDi2015NewLine        // it returns a list of column meta dataDi2015NewLine        List<ColumnInformation> columnInformations = new List<ColumnInformation>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Avoid SQL conncatenation if at all possible.  NEVER concatenate where parameters into SQL commands and NEVER EVER with single quotes.Di2015NewLine        // Here table name requires concatenation but the select parameter TableName does not.Di2015NewLine        string selectCmdString = "SELECT column_name,data_type,character_maximum_length FROM " + dbName + ".information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = @TableName";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use parameters.  Get everything ready first, don't open connections prematurely and only wrap error prone code in try blocks.Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(selectCmdString, conn);Di2015NewLine        SqlParameter tableNameParameter = new SqlParameter("@TableName", tableName);Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.Add(tableNameParameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use a DataReader since you cannot modify this data anyway.Di2015NewLine        // This also shows an appropriate use of a try block to ensure a connection gets closed, Di2015NewLine        // but better yet, open your reader with the CommandBehavior set to closeDi2015NewLine        // and get rid of this try block altogetherDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Reconsider use of a module or global level connection.  May be better to create a new here.Di2015NewLine            conn.Open();Di2015NewLine            SqlDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine            //Favor OOP styles rather than indexes and arrays and repeated calls to determine things like Rows.Count in a loop Di2015NewLine            while(reader.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Favor explicit member access rather than index acess.Di2015NewLine                //YOUR HOMEWORK!  Study DataReader access and rewrite the code below to handle possible nulls in length field.  Use a method based on evaluating conditionals, DO NOT use a method based on a try block.Di2015NewLine                ColumnInformation columnInformation = new ColumnInformation(reader["column_name"].ToString(), reader["data_type"].ToString(), (int)reader["character_maximum_length"].ToString());Di2015NewLine                columnInformations.Add(columnInformation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The only reason to use the try is to make sure the connection gets closed here.  A better approachDi2015NewLine            // is to use the CommandBehavior.CloseConnection option and get rid of the try finally block completely.Di2015NewLine            // But NEVER just wrap a bunch of code in try blocks arbitrarily, swallow any errors and return a null.Di2015NewLine            conn.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return columnInformations;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ColumnInformationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _columnName;Di2015NewLine    private string _dataType;Di2015NewLine    private int _columnLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ColumnNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _columnName; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string DataTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _dataType; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ColumnLengthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _columnLength; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ColumnInformation(string columnName, string dataType, int columnLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _columnName = columnName;Di2015NewLine        _dataType = dataType;Di2015NewLine        _columnLength = columnLength;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5288360Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T SafeLimex<T>(Func<T> F, int Timeout, out bool Completed)   Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       var iar = F.BeginInvoke(null, new object());Di2015NewLine       if (iar.AsyncWaitHandle.WaitOne(Timeout))Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           Completed = true;Di2015NewLine           return F.EndInvoke(iar);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine         F.EndInvoke(iar); //not calling EndInvoke will result in a memory leakDi2015NewLine         Completed = false;Di2015NewLine       return default(T);Di2015NewLine   } Di2015NewLine

result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (binder.Type != typeof(string))Di2015NewLine            return base.TryConvert(binder, out result);Di2015NewLine        result = instance;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool TryInvokeMember(InvokeMemberBinder binder, object[] args, out object result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var method    {Di2015NewLine            var member = members.Single();Di2015NewLine            switch (member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                result = ((PropertyInfo)member).GetValue(instance, null);Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 5299901Di2015UniqueSeparator...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<Point> points = CreateImage(Color.Red,600,600);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<Point> CreateImage(Color drawColor, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create new temporary bitmap.Di2015NewLine        Bitmap background = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create new graphics object.Di2015NewLine        Graphics buffer = Graphics.FromImage(background);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Draw your circle.Di2015NewLine        buffer.DrawEllipse(new Pen(drawColor,1), 300, 300, 100, 200);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the background of the form to your newly created bitmap, if desired.Di2015NewLine        this.BackgroundImage = background;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a list to hold points, and loop through each pixel.Di2015NewLine        List<Point> points = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < background.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < background.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Does the pixel color match the drawing color?Di2015NewLine                // If so, add it to our list of points.Di2015NewLine                Color c = background.GetPixel(x,y);Di2015NewLine                if (c.A == drawColor.A &&Di2015NewLine                    c.R == drawColor.R &&Di2015NewLine                    c.G == drawColor.G &&Di2015NewLine                    c.B == drawColor.B)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    points.Add(new Point(x,y));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return points;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AccessControlAttribute() {Di2015NewLine        if (LockoutEnabled) {Di2015NewLine            Roles = AccessControlSection.Settings.ForceLockout.AllowRoles;Di2015NewLine            Users = AccessControlSection.Settings.ForceLockout.AllowUsers;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void HandleUnauthorizedRequest(AuthorizationContext filterContext) {Di2015NewLine        if (filterContext.IsChildAction || ApproveLockoutAction(filterContext))Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (LockoutEnabled && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(AccessControlSection.Settings.ForceLockout.DefaultPage)) {Di2015NewLine            filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Redirect(AccessControlSection.Settings.ForceLockout.DefaultPage, false);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.HandleUnauthorizedRequest(filterContext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool ApproveLockoutAction(AuthorizationContext filterContext) {Di2015NewLine        var forceLockout = AccessControlSection.Settings.ForceLockout;Di2015NewLine        if (forceLockout == null || !forceLockout.Enabled)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(forceLockout.LogOnUrl) || string.IsNullOrEmpty(forceLockout.LogOffUrl))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (filterContext.HttpContext.Request.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath.Equals(forceLockout.LogOnUrl, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)Di2015NewLine            || filterContext.HttpContext.Request.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath.Equals(forceLockout.LogOffUrl, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)) {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5308922Di2015UniqueSeparatorlock(sync) { // blocks until it successfully takes (re-entrant) lock on syncDi2015NewLine    // here: launch thread 2, to ensure thread 1 has the lock firstDi2015NewLine    Monitor.Wait(sync); // releases lock(s) and waits for pulse,Di2015NewLine                        // then retakes locks(s) when freeDi2015NewLine} // releases lock (or decrement by 1)Di2015NewLine
5308922Di2015UniqueSeparatorlock(sync) { // blocks until it successfully takes (re-entrant) lock on syncDi2015NewLine    Monitor.Pulse(sync); // moves a waiting thread into the ready-queueDi2015NewLine                         // (but the awoken thread still can't continue untilDi2015NewLine                         // it gets the lock itself - and we still hold it)Di2015NewLine} // releases lock (or decrement by 1)Di2015NewLine

5309073Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal void set_Subject(string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((value != null) && MailBnfHelper.HasCROrLF(value))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(SR.GetString("MailSubjectInvalidFormat"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    this.subject = value;Di2015NewLine    if (((this.subject != null) && (this.subjectEncoding == null)) && Di2015NewLine         !MimeBasePart.IsAscii(this.subject, false))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.subjectEncoding = Encoding.GetEncoding("utf-8");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5309073Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static bool IsAscii(string value, bool permitCROrLF)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (char ch in value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ch > '\\x007f')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!permitCROrLF && ((ch == '\\r') || (ch == '\\n')))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5310317Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<GroupPrincipal> GetGroups(string userName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   List<GroupPrincipal> result = new List<GroupPrincipal>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // establish domain contextDi2015NewLine   PrincipalContext yourDomain = new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // find your userDi2015NewLine   UserPrincipal user = UserPrincipal.FindByIdentity(yourDomain, userName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // if found - grab its groupsDi2015NewLine   if(user != null)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      PrincipalSearchResult<Principal> groups = user.GetAuthorizationGroups();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // iterate over all groupsDi2015NewLine      foreach(Principal p in groups)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // make sure to add only group principalsDi2015NewLine         if(p is GroupPrincipal)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             result.Add((GroupPrincipal)p);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5317194Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ArrComparer : IComparerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public int Compare(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string left = x.ToString();Di2015NewLine    string right = y.ToString();Di2015NewLine    string leftName = left.Substring([whatever]);Di2015NewLine    string rightName = right.Substring([whatever]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // First try comparing namesDi2015NewLine    int result = leftName.CompareTo(rightName);Di2015NewLine    if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If that didn't work, compare agesDi2015NewLine    string leftAge = left.Substring([whatever]);Di2015NewLine    string rightAge = right.Substring([whatever]);Di2015NewLine    result = leftAge.CompareTo(rightAge);Di2015NewLine    if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return result;Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Finally compare amounts (descending)Di2015NewLine    string leftAmt = left.Substring([whatever]);Di2015NewLine    string rightAmt = right.Substring([whatever]);Di2015NewLine    result = -leftAmt.CompareTo(rightAmt); // Minus for descendingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5321838Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TModel, T>> GenerateMemberExpression<TModel, T>Di2015NewLine   (string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var propertyInfo = typeof(TModel).GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var entityParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TModel), "e"); Di2015NewLine    Expression columnExpr = Expression.Property(entityParam, propertyInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (propertyInfo.PropertyType != typeof(T))Di2015NewLine        columnExpr = Expression.Convert(columnExpr, typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TModel, T>>(columnExpr, entityParam);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5324507Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar c = a.ExceptBy(b, x => x.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar r = p.ExceptBy(q, x => x.Name, StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TSource> ExceptBy<TSource, TKey>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<TSource> first, IEnumerable<TSource> second,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector,Di2015NewLine        IEqualityComparer<TKey> keyComparer = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("first");Di2015NewLine        if (second == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("second");Di2015NewLine        if (keySelector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("keySelector");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return first.ExceptByIterator(second, keySelector, keyComparer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<TSource> ExceptByIterator<TSource, TKey>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<TSource> first, IEnumerable<TSource> second,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector, IEqualityComparer<TKey> keyComparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var keys = new HashSet<TKey>(second.Select(keySelector), keyComparer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (TSource item in first)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (keys.Add(keySelector(item)))Di2015NewLine                yield return item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
